2273 
2274 FRAME_STAMP::~FRAME_STAMP ()
2275 {
2276 }
2277 
2278 
2279 bool FRAME_STAMP::GetInputTimeCodes (NTV2TimeCodeList & outValues) const
2280 {
2281  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2282  ULWord numRP188s (acTimeCodes.GetByteCount () / sizeof (NTV2_RP188));
2283  const NTV2_RP188 * pArray (reinterpret_cast <const NTV2_RP188 *> (acTimeCodes.GetHostPointer ()));
2284  outValues.clear ();
2285  if (!pArray)
2286  return false; // No 'acTimeCodes' array!
2287 
2288  if (numRP188s > NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES)
2289  numRP188s = NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES; // clamp to this max number
2290 
2291  for (ULWord ndx (0); ndx < numRP188s; ndx++)
2292  outValues << pArray [ndx];
2293 
2294  return true;
2295 }
2296 
2297 
2298 bool FRAME_STAMP::GetInputTimeCode (NTV2_RP188 & outTimeCode, const NTV2TCIndex inTCIndex) const
2299 {
2300  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2301  ULWord numRP188s (acTimeCodes.GetByteCount () / sizeof (NTV2_RP188));
2302  const NTV2_RP188 * pArray (reinterpret_cast <const NTV2_RP188 *> (acTimeCodes.GetHostPointer ()));
2303  outTimeCode.Set (); // invalidate
2304  if (!pArray)
2305  return false; // No 'acTimeCodes' array!
2306  if (numRP188s > NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES)
2307  numRP188s = NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES; // clamp to this max number
2308  if (!NTV2_IS_VALID_TIMECODE_INDEX (inTCIndex))
2309  return false;
2310 
2311  outTimeCode = pArray [inTCIndex];
2312  return true;
2313 }
2314 
2315 
2316 bool FRAME_STAMP::GetInputTimeCodes (NTV2TimeCodes & outTimeCodes, const NTV2Channel inSDIInput, const bool inValidOnly) const
2317 {
2318  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2319  outTimeCodes.clear();
2320 
2321  if (!NTV2_IS_VALID_CHANNEL(inSDIInput))
2322  return false; // Bad SDI input
2323 
2324  NTV2TimeCodeList allTCs;
2325  if (!GetInputTimeCodes(allTCs))
2326  return false; // GetInputTimeCodes failed
2327 
2328  const NTV2TCIndexes tcIndexes (GetTCIndexesForSDIInput(inSDIInput));
2329  for (NTV2TCIndexesConstIter iter(tcIndexes.begin()); iter != tcIndexes.end(); ++iter)
2330  {
2331  const NTV2TCIndex tcIndex(*iter);
2332  NTV2_ASSERT(NTV2_IS_VALID_TIMECODE_INDEX(tcIndex));
2333  const NTV2_RP188 tc(allTCs.at(tcIndex));
2334  if (!inValidOnly)
2335  outTimeCodes[tcIndex] = tc;
2336  else if (tc.IsValid())
2337  outTimeCodes[tcIndex] = tc;
2338  }
2339  return true;
2340 }
2341 
2342 
2343 bool FRAME_STAMP::GetSDIInputStatus(NTV2SDIInputStatus & outStatus, const UWord inSDIInputIndex0) const
2344 {
2345  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2346  (void)outStatus;
2347  (void)inSDIInputIndex0;
2348  return true;
2349 }
2350 
2351 bool FRAME_STAMP::SetInputTimecode (const NTV2TCIndex inTCNdx, const NTV2_RP188 & inTimecode)
2352 {
2353  ULWord numRP188s (acTimeCodes.GetByteCount() / sizeof(NTV2_RP188));
2354  NTV2_RP188 * pArray (reinterpret_cast<NTV2_RP188*>(acTimeCodes.GetHostPointer()));
2355  if (!pArray || !numRP188s)
2356  return false; // No 'acTimeCodes' array!
2357 
2358  if (numRP188s > NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES)
2359  numRP188s = NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES; // clamp to this max number
2360  if (ULWord(inTCNdx) >= numRP188s)
2361  return false; // Past end
2362 
2363  pArray[inTCNdx] = inTimecode; // Write the new value
2364  return true; // Success!
2365 }
2366 
2367 
2368 FRAME_STAMP & FRAME_STAMP::operator = (const FRAME_STAMP & inRHS)
2369 {
2370  if (this != &inRHS)
2371  {
2372  acTimeCodes = inRHS.acTimeCodes;
2373  acHeader = inRHS.acHeader;
2374  acFrameTime = inRHS.acFrameTime;
2375  acRequestedFrame = inRHS.acRequestedFrame;
2376  acAudioClockTimeStamp = inRHS.acAudioClockTimeStamp;
2377  acAudioExpectedAddress = inRHS.acAudioExpectedAddress;
2378  acAudioInStartAddress = inRHS.acAudioInStartAddress;
2379  acAudioInStopAddress = inRHS.acAudioInStopAddress;
2380  acAudioOutStopAddress = inRHS.acAudioOutStopAddress;
2381  acAudioOutStartAddress = inRHS.acAudioOutStartAddress;
2382  acTotalBytesTransferred = inRHS.acTotalBytesTransferred;
2383  acStartSample = inRHS.acStartSample;
2384  acCurrentTime = inRHS.acCurrentTime;
2385  acCurrentFrame = inRHS.acCurrentFrame;
2386  acCurrentFrameTime = inRHS.acCurrentFrameTime;
2387  acAudioClockCurrentTime = inRHS.acAudioClockCurrentTime;
2388  acCurrentAudioExpectedAddress = inRHS.acCurrentAudioExpectedAddress;
2389  acCurrentAudioStartAddress = inRHS.acCurrentAudioStartAddress;
2390  acCurrentFieldCount = inRHS.acCurrentFieldCount;
2391  acCurrentLineCount = inRHS.acCurrentLineCount;
2392  acCurrentReps = inRHS.acCurrentReps;
2393  acCurrentUserCookie = inRHS.acCurrentUserCookie;
2394  acFrame = inRHS.acFrame;
2395  acRP188 = inRHS.acRP188;
2396  acTrailer = inRHS.acTrailer;
2397  }
2398  return *this;
2399 }
2400 
2401 
2402 bool FRAME_STAMP::SetFrom (const FRAME_STAMP_STRUCT & inOldStruct)
2403 {
2404  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2405  //acCrosspoint = inOldStruct.channelSpec;
2406  acFrameTime = inOldStruct.frameTime;
2407  acRequestedFrame = inOldStruct.frame;
2408  acAudioClockTimeStamp = inOldStruct.audioClockTimeStamp;
2409  acAudioExpectedAddress = inOldStruct.audioExpectedAddress;
2410  acAudioInStartAddress = inOldStruct.audioInStartAddress;
2411  acAudioInStopAddress = inOldStruct.audioInStopAddress;
2412  acAudioOutStopAddress = inOldStruct.audioOutStopAddress;
2413  acAudioOutStartAddress = inOldStruct.audioOutStartAddress;
2414  acTotalBytesTransferred = inOldStruct.bytesRead;
2415  acStartSample = inOldStruct.startSample;
2416  acCurrentTime = inOldStruct.currentTime;
2417  acCurrentFrame = inOldStruct.currentFrame;
2418  acCurrentFrameTime = inOldStruct.currentFrameTime;
2419  acAudioClockCurrentTime = inOldStruct.audioClockCurrentTime;
2420  acCurrentAudioExpectedAddress = inOldStruct.currentAudioExpectedAddress;
2421  acCurrentAudioStartAddress = inOldStruct.currentAudioStartAddress;
2422  acCurrentFieldCount = inOldStruct.currentFieldCount;
2423  acCurrentLineCount = inOldStruct.currentLineCount;
2424  acCurrentReps = inOldStruct.currentReps;
2425  acCurrentUserCookie = inOldStruct.currenthUser;
2426  acRP188 = NTV2_RP188 (inOldStruct.currentRP188);
2427  if (!acTimeCodes.IsNULL() && acTimeCodes.GetByteCount () >= sizeof (NTV2_RP188))
2428  {
2429  NTV2_RP188 * pTimecodes (reinterpret_cast <NTV2_RP188 *> (acTimeCodes.GetHostPointer ()));
2430  NTV2_ASSERT (pTimecodes);
2431  NTV2_ASSERT (NTV2_TCINDEX_DEFAULT == 0);
2432  pTimecodes [NTV2_TCINDEX_DEFAULT] = acRP188;
2433  }
2434  return true;
2435 }
2436 
2437 
2438 bool FRAME_STAMP::CopyTo (FRAME_STAMP_STRUCT & outOldStruct) const
2439 {
2440  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2441  outOldStruct.frameTime = acFrameTime;
2442  outOldStruct.frame = acRequestedFrame;
2443  outOldStruct.audioClockTimeStamp = acAudioClockTimeStamp;
2444  outOldStruct.audioExpectedAddress = acAudioExpectedAddress;
2445  outOldStruct.audioInStartAddress = acAudioInStartAddress;
2446  outOldStruct.audioInStopAddress = acAudioInStopAddress;
2447  outOldStruct.audioOutStopAddress = acAudioOutStopAddress;
2448  outOldStruct.audioOutStartAddress = acAudioOutStartAddress;
2449  outOldStruct.bytesRead = acTotalBytesTransferred;
2450  outOldStruct.startSample = acStartSample;
2451  outOldStruct.currentTime = acCurrentTime;
2452  outOldStruct.currentFrame = acCurrentFrame;
2453  outOldStruct.currentFrameTime = acCurrentFrameTime;
2454  outOldStruct.audioClockCurrentTime = acAudioClockCurrentTime;
2455  outOldStruct.currentAudioExpectedAddress = acCurrentAudioExpectedAddress;
2456  outOldStruct.currentAudioStartAddress = acCurrentAudioStartAddress;
2457  outOldStruct.currentFieldCount = acCurrentFieldCount;
2458  outOldStruct.currentLineCount = acCurrentLineCount;
2459  outOldStruct.currentReps = acCurrentReps;
2460  outOldStruct.currenthUser = ULWord(acCurrentUserCookie);
2461  outOldStruct.currentRP188 = acRP188;
2462  // Ticket 3367 -- Mark Gilbert of Gallery UK reports that after updating from AJA Retail Software 10.5 to 14.0,
2463  // their QuickTime app stopped receiving timecode during capture. Turns out the QuickTime components use the new
2464  // AutoCirculate APIs, but internally still use the old FRAME_STAMP_STRUCT for frame info, including timecode...
2465  // ...and only use the "currentRP188" field for the "retail" timecode.
2466  // Sadly, this FRAME_STAMP-to-FRAME_STAMP_STRUCT function historically only set "currentRP188" from the deprecated
2467  // (and completely unused) "acRP188" field, when it really should've been using the acTimeCodes[NTV2_TCINDEX_DEFAULT]
2468  // value all along...
2469  if (!acTimeCodes.IsNULL()) // If there's an acTimeCodes buffer...
2470  if (acTimeCodes.GetByteCount() >= sizeof(NTV2_RP188)) // ...and it has at least one timecode value...
2471  {
2472  const NTV2_RP188 * pDefaultTC (reinterpret_cast<const NTV2_RP188*>(acTimeCodes.GetHostPointer()));
2473  if (pDefaultTC)
2474  outOldStruct.currentRP188 = pDefaultTC[NTV2_TCINDEX_DEFAULT]; // Stuff the "default" (retail) timecode into "currentRP188".
2475  }
2476  return true;
2477 }
2478 
2479 
2480 string FRAME_STAMP::operator [] (const unsigned inIndexNum) const
2481 {
2482  ostringstream oss;
2483  NTV2_RP188 rp188;
2484  if (GetInputTimeCode (rp188, NTV2TimecodeIndex (inIndexNum)))
2485  {
2486  if (rp188.IsValid())
2487  {
2488  CRP188 foo (rp188);
2489  oss << foo;
2490  }
2491  else
2492  oss << "---";
2493  }
2494  else if (NTV2_IS_VALID_TIMECODE_INDEX (inIndexNum))
2495  oss << "---";
2496  return oss.str();
2497 }
2498 
2499 
2500 NTV2SDIInStatistics::NTV2SDIInStatistics()
2501  : mHeader(NTV2_TYPE_SDISTATS, sizeof(NTV2SDIInStatistics)),
2502  mInStatistics(NTV2_MAX_NUM_CHANNELS * sizeof(NTV2SDIInputStatus))
2503 {
2504  Clear();
2505  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2506 }
2507 
2508 void NTV2SDIInStatistics::Clear(void)
2509 {
2510  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2511  if (mInStatistics.IsNULL())
2512  return;
2513  NTV2SDIInputStatus * pArray(reinterpret_cast <NTV2SDIInputStatus *> (mInStatistics.GetHostPointer()));
2514  for (int i = 0; i < NTV2_MAX_NUM_CHANNELS; i++)
2515  pArray[i].Clear();
2516 }
2517 
2518 bool NTV2SDIInStatistics::GetSDIInputStatus(NTV2SDIInputStatus & outStatus, const UWord inSDIInputIndex0)
2519 {
2520  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2521  const ULWord numElements(mInStatistics.GetByteCount() / sizeof(NTV2SDIInputStatus));
2522  const NTV2SDIInputStatus * pArray(reinterpret_cast <const NTV2SDIInputStatus *> (mInStatistics.GetHostPointer()));
2523  outStatus.Clear();
2524  if (!pArray)
2525  return false;
2526  if (numElements != 8)
2527  return false;
2528  if (inSDIInputIndex0 >= numElements)
2529  return false;
2530  outStatus = pArray[inSDIInputIndex0];
2531  return true;
2532 }
2533 
2534 NTV2SDIInputStatus & NTV2SDIInStatistics::operator [] (const size_t inSDIInputIndex0)
2535 {
2536  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2537  static NTV2SDIInputStatus dummy;
2538  const ULWord numElements(mInStatistics.GetByteCount() / sizeof(NTV2SDIInputStatus));
2539  NTV2SDIInputStatus * pArray(reinterpret_cast<NTV2SDIInputStatus*>(mInStatistics.GetHostPointer()));
2540  if (!pArray)
2541  return dummy;
2542  if (numElements != 8)
2543  return dummy;
2544  if (inSDIInputIndex0 >= numElements)
2545  return dummy;
2546  return pArray[inSDIInputIndex0];
2547 }
2548 
2549 std::ostream & NTV2SDIInStatistics::Print(std::ostream & inOutStream) const
2550 {
2551  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2552  inOutStream << mHeader << ", " << mInStatistics << ", " << mTrailer; return inOutStream;
2553 }

2557  : acHeader (NTV2_TYPE_ACXFERSTATUS, sizeof (AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER_STATUS)),
2558  acState (NTV2_AUTOCIRCULATE_DISABLED),
2559  acTransferFrame (0),
2560  acBufferLevel (0),
2561  acFramesProcessed (0),
2562  acFramesDropped (0),
2563  acFrameStamp (),
2564  acAudioTransferSize (0),
2565  acAudioStartSample (0),
2566  acAncTransferSize (0),
2567  acAncField2TransferSize (0)
2568  //acTrailer ()
2569 {
2570  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2571 }

2573 
2574 AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS::AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS (const NTV2Crosspoint inCrosspoint)
2575  : acHeader (NTV2_TYPE_ACSTATUS, sizeof (AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS)),
2576  acCrosspoint (inCrosspoint),
2577  acState (NTV2_AUTOCIRCULATE_DISABLED),
2578  acStartFrame (0),
2579  acEndFrame (0),
2580  acActiveFrame (0),
2581  acRDTSCStartTime (0),
2582  acAudioClockStartTime (0),
2583  acRDTSCCurrentTime (0),
2584  acAudioClockCurrentTime (0),
2585  acFramesProcessed (0),
2586  acFramesDropped (0),
2587  acBufferLevel (0),
2588  acOptionFlags (0),
2589  acAudioSystem (NTV2_AUDIOSYSTEM_INVALID)
2590 {
2591  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2592 }
2593 
2594 
2595 bool AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS::CopyTo (AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS_STRUCT & outOldStruct)
2596 {
2597  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2598  outOldStruct.channelSpec = acCrosspoint;
2599  outOldStruct.state = acState;
2600  outOldStruct.startFrame = acStartFrame;
2601  outOldStruct.endFrame = acEndFrame;
2602  outOldStruct.activeFrame = acActiveFrame;
2603  outOldStruct.rdtscStartTime = acRDTSCStartTime;
2604  outOldStruct.audioClockStartTime = acAudioClockStartTime;
2605  outOldStruct.rdtscCurrentTime = acRDTSCCurrentTime;
2606  outOldStruct.audioClockCurrentTime = acAudioClockCurrentTime;
2607  outOldStruct.framesProcessed = acFramesProcessed;
2608  outOldStruct.framesDropped = acFramesDropped;
2609  outOldStruct.bufferLevel = acBufferLevel;
2610  outOldStruct.bWithAudio = NTV2_IS_VALID_AUDIO_SYSTEM (acAudioSystem);
2611  outOldStruct.bWithRP188 = acOptionFlags & AUTOCIRCULATE_WITH_RP188 ? 1 : 0;
2612  outOldStruct.bFbfChange = acOptionFlags & AUTOCIRCULATE_WITH_FBFCHANGE ? 1 : 0;
2613  outOldStruct.bFboChange = acOptionFlags & AUTOCIRCULATE_WITH_FBOCHANGE ? 1 : 0;
2614  outOldStruct.bWithColorCorrection = acOptionFlags & AUTOCIRCULATE_WITH_COLORCORRECT ? 1 : 0;
2615  outOldStruct.bWithVidProc = acOptionFlags & AUTOCIRCULATE_WITH_VIDPROC ? 1 : 0;
2616  outOldStruct.bWithCustomAncData = acOptionFlags & AUTOCIRCULATE_WITH_ANC ? 1 : 0;
2617  return true;
2618 }
2619 
2620 
2621 bool AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS::CopyFrom (const AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS_STRUCT & inOldStruct)
2622 {
2623  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2624  acCrosspoint = inOldStruct.channelSpec;
2625  acState = inOldStruct.state;
2626  acStartFrame = inOldStruct.startFrame;
2627  acEndFrame = inOldStruct.endFrame;
2628  acActiveFrame = inOldStruct.activeFrame;
2629  acRDTSCStartTime = inOldStruct.rdtscStartTime;
2630  acAudioClockStartTime = inOldStruct.audioClockStartTime;
2631  acRDTSCCurrentTime = inOldStruct.rdtscCurrentTime;
2632  acAudioClockCurrentTime = inOldStruct.audioClockCurrentTime;
2633  acFramesProcessed = inOldStruct.framesProcessed;
2634  acFramesDropped = inOldStruct.framesDropped;
2635  acBufferLevel = inOldStruct.bufferLevel;
2636  acAudioSystem = NTV2_AUDIOSYSTEM_INVALID; // NTV2_AUDIOSYSTEM_1;
2637  acOptionFlags = (inOldStruct.bWithRP188 ? AUTOCIRCULATE_WITH_RP188 : 0) |
2638  (inOldStruct.bFbfChange ? AUTOCIRCULATE_WITH_FBFCHANGE : 0) |
2639  (inOldStruct.bFboChange ? AUTOCIRCULATE_WITH_FBOCHANGE : 0) |
2640  (inOldStruct.bWithColorCorrection ? AUTOCIRCULATE_WITH_COLORCORRECT : 0) |
2641  (inOldStruct.bWithVidProc ? AUTOCIRCULATE_WITH_VIDPROC : 0) |
2642  (inOldStruct.bWithCustomAncData ? AUTOCIRCULATE_WITH_ANC : 0);
2643  return true;
2644 }
2645 
2646 
2647 void AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS::Clear (void)
2648 {
2649  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2650  acCrosspoint = NTV2CROSSPOINT_INVALID;
2651  acState = NTV2_AUTOCIRCULATE_DISABLED;
2652  acStartFrame = 0;
2653  acEndFrame = 0;
2654  acActiveFrame = 0;
2655  acRDTSCStartTime = 0;
2656  acAudioClockStartTime = 0;
2657  acRDTSCCurrentTime = 0;
2658  acAudioClockCurrentTime = 0;
2659  acFramesProcessed = 0;
2660  acFramesDropped = 0;
2661  acBufferLevel = 0;
2662  acOptionFlags = 0;
2663  acAudioSystem = NTV2_AUDIOSYSTEM_INVALID;
2664 }
2665 
2666 
2667 NTV2Channel AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS::GetChannel (void) const
2668 {
2669  return ::NTV2CrosspointToNTV2Channel(acCrosspoint);
2670 }
2671 
2672 
2673 struct ThousandsSeparator : std::numpunct <char>
2674 {
2675  virtual inline char do_thousands_sep() const {return ',';}
2676  virtual inline std::string do_grouping() const {return "\03";}
2677 };
2678 
2679 
2680 template <class T> string CommaStr (const T & inNum)
2681 {
2682  ostringstream oss;
2683  const locale loc (oss.getloc(), new ThousandsSeparator);
2684  oss.imbue (loc);
2685  oss << inNum;
2686  return oss.str();
2687 } // CommaStr
2688 
2689 
2690 string AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS::operator [] (const unsigned inIndexNum) const
2691 {
2692  ostringstream oss;
2693  if (inIndexNum == 0)
2694  oss << ::NTV2AutoCirculateStateToString(acState);
2695  else if (!IsStopped())
2696  switch (inIndexNum)
2697  {
2698  case 1: oss << DEC(GetStartFrame()); break;
2699  case 2: oss << DEC(GetEndFrame()); break;
2700  case 3: oss << DEC(GetFrameCount()); break;
2701  case 4: oss << DEC(GetActiveFrame()); break;
2702  case 5: oss << xHEX0N(acRDTSCStartTime,16); break;
2703  case 6: oss << xHEX0N(acAudioClockStartTime,16); break;
2704  case 7: oss << DEC(acRDTSCCurrentTime); break;
2705  case 8: oss << DEC(acAudioClockCurrentTime); break;
2706  case 9: oss << CommaStr(GetProcessedFrameCount()); break;
2707  case 10: oss << CommaStr(GetDroppedFrameCount()); break;
2708  case 11: oss << DEC(GetBufferLevel()); break;
2709  case 12: oss << ::NTV2AudioSystemToString(acAudioSystem, true); break;
2710  case 13: oss << (WithRP188() ? "Yes" : "No"); break;
2711  case 14: oss << (WithLTC() ? "Yes" : "No"); break;
2712  case 15: oss << (WithFBFChange() ? "Yes" : "No"); break;
2713  case 16: oss << (WithFBOChange() ? "Yes" : "No"); break;
2714  case 17: oss << (WithColorCorrect() ? "Yes" : "No"); break;
2715  case 18: oss << (WithVidProc() ? "Yes" : "No"); break;
2716  case 19: oss << (WithCustomAnc() ? "Yes" : "No"); break;
2717  case 20: oss << (WithHDMIAuxData() ? "Yes" : "No"); break;
2718  case 21: oss << (IsFieldMode() ? "Yes" : "No"); break;
2719  default: break;
2720  }
2721  else if (inIndexNum < 22)
2722  oss << "---";
2723  return oss.str();
2724 }
2725 
2726 
2727 ostream & operator << (ostream & oss, const AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS & inObj)
2728 {
2729  if (!inObj.IsStopped())
2730  oss << ::NTV2ChannelToString(inObj.GetChannel(), true) << ": "
2731  << (inObj.IsInput() ? "Input " : (inObj.IsOutput() ? "Output" : "*BAD* "))
2732  << setw(12) << ::NTV2AutoCirculateStateToString(inObj.acState) << " "
2733  << setw( 5) << inObj.GetStartFrame()
2734  << setw( 6) << inObj.GetEndFrame()
2735  << setw( 6) << inObj.GetActiveFrame()
2736  << setw( 8) << inObj.GetProcessedFrameCount()
2737  << setw( 8) << inObj.GetDroppedFrameCount()
2738  << setw( 7) << inObj.GetBufferLevel()
2739  << setw(10) << ::NTV2AudioSystemToString(inObj.acAudioSystem, true)
2740  << setw(10) << (inObj.WithRP188() ? "+RP188" : "-RP188")
2741  << setw(10) << (inObj.WithLTC() ? "+LTC" : "-LTC")
2742  << setw(10) << (inObj.WithFBFChange() ? "+FBFchg" : "-FBFchg")
2743  << setw(10) << (inObj.WithFBOChange() ? "+FBOchg" : "-FBOchg")
2744  << setw(10) << (inObj.WithColorCorrect() ? "+ColCor" : "-ColCor")
2745  << setw(10) << (inObj.WithVidProc() ? "+VidProc" : "-VidProc")
2746  << setw(10) << (inObj.WithCustomAnc() ? "+AncData" : "-AncData")
2747  << setw(10) << (inObj.WithHDMIAuxData() ? "+HDMIAux" : "-HDMIAux")
2748  << setw(10) << (inObj.IsFieldMode() ? "+FldMode" : "-FldMode");
2749  return oss;
2750 }
2751 
2752 
2753 NTV2SegmentedDMAInfo::NTV2SegmentedDMAInfo ()
2754 {
2755  Reset ();
2756 }
2757 
2758 
2759 NTV2SegmentedDMAInfo::NTV2SegmentedDMAInfo (const ULWord inNumSegments, const ULWord inNumActiveBytesPerRow, const ULWord inHostBytesPerRow, const ULWord inDeviceBytesPerRow)
2760 {
2761  Set (inNumSegments, inNumActiveBytesPerRow, inHostBytesPerRow, inDeviceBytesPerRow);
2762 }
2763 
2764 
2765 void NTV2SegmentedDMAInfo::Set (const ULWord inNumSegments, const ULWord inNumActiveBytesPerRow, const ULWord inHostBytesPerRow, const ULWord inDeviceBytesPerRow)
2766 {
2767  acNumSegments = inNumSegments;
2768  if (acNumSegments > 1)
2769  {
2770  acNumActiveBytesPerRow = inNumActiveBytesPerRow;
2771  acSegmentHostPitch = inHostBytesPerRow;
2772  acSegmentDevicePitch = inDeviceBytesPerRow;
2773  }
2774  else
2775  Reset ();
2776 }
2777 
2778 
2779 void NTV2SegmentedDMAInfo::Reset (void)
2780 {
2781  acNumSegments = acNumActiveBytesPerRow = acSegmentHostPitch = acSegmentDevicePitch = 0;
2782 }
2783 
2784 
2785 NTV2ColorCorrectionData::NTV2ColorCorrectionData ()
2786  : ccMode (NTV2_CCMODE_INVALID),
2787  ccSaturationValue (0)
2788 {
2789 }
2790 
2791 
2792 NTV2ColorCorrectionData::~NTV2ColorCorrectionData ()
2793 {
2794  Clear ();
2795 }
2796 
2797 
2798 void NTV2ColorCorrectionData::Clear (void)
2799 {
2800  ccMode = NTV2_CCMODE_INVALID;
2801  ccSaturationValue = 0;
2802  ccLookupTables.Deallocate();
2803 }
2804 
2805 
2806 bool NTV2ColorCorrectionData::Set (const NTV2ColorCorrectionMode inMode, const ULWord inSaturation, const void * pInTableData)
2807 {
2808  Clear();
2809  if (!NTV2_IS_VALID_COLOR_CORRECTION_MODE (inMode))
2810  return false;
2811 
2812  if (pInTableData)
2813  if (!ccLookupTables.CopyFrom(pInTableData, ULWord(NTV2_COLORCORRECTOR_TABLESIZE)))
2814  return false;
2815  ccMode = inMode;
2816  ccSaturationValue = (inMode == NTV2_CCMODE_3WAY) ? inSaturation : 0;
2817  return true;
2818 }
2819 
2820 
2821 AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER ()
2822  : acHeader (NTV2_TYPE_ACXFER, sizeof(AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER)),
2823  acOutputTimeCodes (NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES * sizeof (NTV2_RP188)),
2824  acTransferStatus (),
2825  acInUserCookie (0),
2826  acInVideoDMAOffset (0),
2827  acInSegmentedDMAInfo (),
2828  acColorCorrection (),
2829  acFrameBufferFormat (NTV2_FBF_10BIT_YCBCR),
2830  acFrameBufferOrientation (NTV2_FRAMEBUFFER_ORIENTATION_TOPDOWN),
2831  acVidProcInfo (),
2832  acVideoQuarterSizeExpand (NTV2_QuarterSizeExpandOff),
2833  acPeerToPeerFlags (0),
2834  acFrameRepeatCount (1),
2835  acDesiredFrame (-1),
2836  acRP188 (),
2837  acCrosspoint (NTV2CROSSPOINT_INVALID)
2838 {
2839  if (acOutputTimeCodes.GetHostPointer ())
2840  ::memset (acOutputTimeCodes.GetHostPointer (), 0xFF, acOutputTimeCodes.GetByteCount ());
2841  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2842 }
2843 
2844 
2845 AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER (ULWord * pInVideoBuffer, const ULWord inVideoByteCount, ULWord * pInAudioBuffer,
2846  const ULWord inAudioByteCount, ULWord * pInANCBuffer, const ULWord inANCByteCount,
2847  ULWord * pInANCF2Buffer, const ULWord inANCF2ByteCount)
2848  : acHeader (NTV2_TYPE_ACXFER, sizeof(AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER)),
2849  acVideoBuffer (pInVideoBuffer, inVideoByteCount),
2850  acAudioBuffer (pInAudioBuffer, inAudioByteCount),
2851  acANCBuffer (pInANCBuffer, inANCByteCount),
2852  acANCField2Buffer (pInANCF2Buffer, inANCF2ByteCount),
2853  acOutputTimeCodes (NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES * sizeof (NTV2_RP188)),
2854  acTransferStatus (),
2855  acInUserCookie (0),
2856  acInVideoDMAOffset (0),
2857  acInSegmentedDMAInfo (),
2858  acColorCorrection (),
2859  acFrameBufferFormat (NTV2_FBF_10BIT_YCBCR),
2860  acFrameBufferOrientation (NTV2_FRAMEBUFFER_ORIENTATION_TOPDOWN),
2861  acVidProcInfo (),
2862  acVideoQuarterSizeExpand (NTV2_QuarterSizeExpandOff),
2863  acPeerToPeerFlags (0),
2864  acFrameRepeatCount (1),
2865  acDesiredFrame (-1),
2866  acRP188 (),
2867  acCrosspoint (NTV2CROSSPOINT_INVALID)
2868 {
2869  if (acOutputTimeCodes.GetHostPointer ())
2870  ::memset (acOutputTimeCodes.GetHostPointer (), 0xFF, acOutputTimeCodes.GetByteCount ());
2871  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2872 }
2873

2876 {
2877 }

2879 
2880 bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::SetBuffers (ULWord * pInVideoBuffer, const ULWord inVideoByteCount,
2881  ULWord * pInAudioBuffer, const ULWord inAudioByteCount,
2882  ULWord * pInANCBuffer, const ULWord inANCByteCount,
2883  ULWord * pInANCF2Buffer, const ULWord inANCF2ByteCount)
2884 {
2885  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2886  return SetVideoBuffer (pInVideoBuffer, inVideoByteCount)
2887  && SetAudioBuffer (pInAudioBuffer, inAudioByteCount)
2888  && SetAncBuffers (pInANCBuffer, inANCByteCount, pInANCF2Buffer, inANCF2ByteCount);
2889 }
2890

2893 {
2894  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2895  acVideoBuffer.Set (pInVideoBuffer, inVideoByteCount);
2896  return true;
2897 }

2903  acAudioBuffer.Set (pInAudioBuffer, inAudioByteCount);
2904  return true;
2905 }

2909 {
2910  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2911  acANCBuffer.Set (pInANCBuffer, inANCByteCount);
2912  acANCField2Buffer.Set (pInANCF2Buffer, inANCF2ByteCount);
2913  return true;
2914 }
2915 
2916 static const NTV2_RP188 INVALID_TIMECODE_VALUE;
2917 
2918 
2919 bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::SetOutputTimeCodes (const NTV2TimeCodes & inValues)
2920 {
2921  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2922  ULWord maxNumValues (acOutputTimeCodes.GetByteCount() / sizeof(NTV2_RP188));
2923  NTV2_RP188 * pArray (reinterpret_cast<NTV2_RP188*>(acOutputTimeCodes.GetHostPointer()));
2924  if (!pArray)
2925  return false;
2926  if (maxNumValues > NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES)
2927  maxNumValues = NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES;
2928 
2929  for (UWord ndx (0); ndx < UWord(maxNumValues); ndx++)
2930  {
2931  const NTV2TCIndex tcIndex (static_cast<NTV2TCIndex>(ndx));
2932  NTV2TimeCodesConstIter iter (inValues.find(tcIndex));
2933  pArray[ndx] = (iter != inValues.end()) ? iter->second : INVALID_TIMECODE_VALUE;
2934  } // for each possible NTV2TCSource value
2935  return true;
2936 }
2937 
2938 
2939 bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::SetOutputTimeCode (const NTV2_RP188 & inTimeCode, const NTV2TCIndex inTCIndex)
2940 {
2941  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2942  ULWord maxNumValues (acOutputTimeCodes.GetByteCount() / sizeof(NTV2_RP188));
2943  NTV2_RP188 * pArray (reinterpret_cast<NTV2_RP188*>(acOutputTimeCodes.GetHostPointer()));
2944  if (!pArray)
2945  return false;
2946  if (maxNumValues > NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES)
2947  maxNumValues = NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES;
2948  if (!NTV2_IS_VALID_TIMECODE_INDEX(inTCIndex))
2949  return false;
2950 
2951  pArray[inTCIndex] = inTimeCode;
2952  return true;
2953 }
2954 
2955 bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::SetAllOutputTimeCodes (const NTV2_RP188 & inTimeCode, const bool inIncludeF2)
2956 {
2957  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2958  ULWord maxNumValues (acOutputTimeCodes.GetByteCount() / sizeof(NTV2_RP188));
2959  NTV2_RP188 * pArray (reinterpret_cast<NTV2_RP188*>(acOutputTimeCodes.GetHostPointer()));
2960  if (!pArray)
2961  return false;
2962  if (maxNumValues > NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES)
2963  maxNumValues = NTV2_MAX_NUM_TIMECODE_INDEXES;
2964 
2965  for (ULWord tcIndex(0); tcIndex < maxNumValues; tcIndex++)
2966  if (NTV2_IS_ATC_VITC2_TIMECODE_INDEX(tcIndex))
2967  pArray[tcIndex] = inIncludeF2 ? inTimeCode : INVALID_TIMECODE_VALUE;
2968  else
2969  pArray[tcIndex] = inTimeCode;
2970  return true;
2971 }
2972 
2973 
2974 bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::SetFrameBufferFormat (const NTV2FrameBufferFormat inNewFormat)
2975 {
2976  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2977  if (!NTV2_IS_VALID_FRAME_BUFFER_FORMAT (inNewFormat))
2978  return false;
2979  acFrameBufferFormat = inNewFormat;
2980  return true;
2981 }
2982 
2983 
2984 void AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::Clear (void)
2985 {
2986  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2987  SetBuffers (AJA_NULL, 0, AJA_NULL, 0, AJA_NULL, 0, AJA_NULL, 0);
2988 }
2989 
2990 
2991 bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::EnableSegmentedDMAs (const ULWord inNumSegments, const ULWord inNumActiveBytesPerRow,
2992  const ULWord inHostBytesPerRow, const ULWord inDeviceBytesPerRow)
2993 {
2994  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
2995  // Cannot allow segmented DMAs if video buffer was self-allocated by the SDK, since the video buffer size holds the segment size (in bytes)...
2996  if (acVideoBuffer.IsAllocatedBySDK ())
2997  return false; // Disallow
2998  acInSegmentedDMAInfo.Set (inNumSegments, inNumActiveBytesPerRow, inHostBytesPerRow, inDeviceBytesPerRow);
2999  return true;
3000 }
3001 
3002 
3003 bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::DisableSegmentedDMAs (void)
3004 {
3005  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3006  acInSegmentedDMAInfo.Reset ();
3007  return true;
3008 }
3009 
3010 
3011 bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::SegmentedDMAsEnabled (void) const
3012 {
3013  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3014  return acInSegmentedDMAInfo.acNumSegments > 1;
3015 }

3164 
3165 NTV2GetRegisters::NTV2GetRegisters (const NTV2RegNumSet & inRegisterNumbers)
3166  : mHeader (NTV2_TYPE_GETREGS, sizeof(NTV2GetRegisters)),
3167  mInNumRegisters (ULWord (inRegisterNumbers.size ())),
3168  mOutNumRegisters (0)
3169 {
3170  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3171  ResetUsing (inRegisterNumbers);
3172 }
3173 
3174 
3175 NTV2GetRegisters::NTV2GetRegisters (NTV2RegisterReads & inRegReads)
3176  : mHeader (NTV2_TYPE_GETREGS, sizeof(NTV2GetRegisters)),
3177  mInNumRegisters (ULWord (inRegReads.size ())),
3178  mOutNumRegisters (0)
3179 {
3180  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3181  ResetUsing (inRegReads);
3182 }
3183 
3184 
3185 bool NTV2GetRegisters::ResetUsing (const NTV2RegNumSet & inRegisterNumbers)
3186 {
3187  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3188  mInNumRegisters = ULWord(inRegisterNumbers.size());
3189  mOutNumRegisters = 0;
3190  bool result ( mInRegisters.Allocate(mInNumRegisters * sizeof(ULWord))
3191  && mOutGoodRegisters.Allocate(mInNumRegisters * sizeof(ULWord))
3192  && mOutValues.Allocate(mInNumRegisters * sizeof(ULWord)));
3193  if (!result)
3194  return false;
3195  mInRegisters.Fill(ULWord(0)); mOutGoodRegisters.Fill(ULWord(0)); mOutValues.Fill(ULWord(0));
3196 
3197  ULWord * pRegArray(mInRegisters);
3198  if (!pRegArray)
3199  return false;
3200 
3201  ULWord ndx(0);
3202  for (NTV2RegNumSetConstIter iter(inRegisterNumbers.begin()); iter != inRegisterNumbers.end(); ++iter)
3203  pRegArray[ndx++] = *iter;
3204  return (ndx * sizeof(ULWord)) == mInRegisters.GetByteCount();
3205 }
3206 
3207 bool NTV2GetRegisters::GetRequestedRegisterNumbers (NTV2RegNumSet & outRegNums) const
3208 {
3209  outRegNums.clear();
3210  if (!mInNumRegisters)
3211  return true; // None requested
3212  if (!mInRegisters)
3213  return false; // Empty/NULL reg num buffer
3214  if (mInRegisters.GetByteCount()/4 < mInNumRegisters)
3215  return false; // Sanity check failed: Reg num buffer too small
3216 
3217  const ULWord * pRegNums(mInRegisters);
3218  for (ULWord ndx(0); ndx < mInNumRegisters; ndx++)
3219  if (outRegNums.find(pRegNums[ndx]) == outRegNums.end())
3220  outRegNums.insert(pRegNums[ndx]);
3221  return true;
3222 }
3223 
3224 
3225 bool NTV2GetRegisters::GetGoodRegisters (NTV2RegNumSet & outGoodRegNums) const
3226 {
3227  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3228  outGoodRegNums.clear();
3229  if (!mOutGoodRegisters)
3230  return false; // Empty/NULL 'mOutGoodRegisters' array!
3231  if (!mOutNumRegisters)
3232  return false; // The driver says zero successfully read!
3233  if (mOutNumRegisters > mInNumRegisters)
3234  return false; // Sanity check failed: mOutNumRegisters must be less than or equal to mInNumRegisters!
3235 
3236  const ULWord * pRegArray (mOutGoodRegisters);
3237  for (ULWord ndx(0); ndx < mOutNumRegisters; ndx++)
3238  outGoodRegNums.insert(pRegArray[ndx]);
3239  return true;
3240 }
3241 
3242 bool NTV2GetRegisters::GetBadRegisters (NTV2RegNumSet & outBadRegNums) const
3243 {
3244  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3245  outBadRegNums.clear();
3246  NTV2RegNumSet reqRegNums, goodRegNums;
3247  if (!GetRequestedRegisterNumbers(reqRegNums))
3248  return false;
3249  if (!GetGoodRegisters(goodRegNums))
3250  return false;
3251  if (reqRegNums == goodRegNums)
3252  return true; // Requested reg nums identical to those that were read successfully
3253 
3254  // Subtract goodRegNums from reqRegNums...
3255  std::set_difference (reqRegNums.begin(), reqRegNums.end(),
3256  goodRegNums.begin(), goodRegNums.end(),
3257  std::inserter(outBadRegNums, outBadRegNums.begin()));
3258  return true;
3259 }
3260 
3261 bool NTV2GetRegisters::PatchRegister (const ULWord inRegNum, const ULWord inValue)
3262 {
3263  if (!mOutGoodRegisters)
3264  return false; // Empty/null 'mOutGoodRegisters' array!
3265  if (!mOutNumRegisters)
3266  return false; // Driver says zero successfully read!
3267  if (mOutNumRegisters > mInNumRegisters)
3268  return false; // Sanity check failed: mOutNumRegisters must be less than or equal to mInNumRegisters!
3269  if (!mOutValues)
3270  return false; // Empty/null 'mOutValues' array!
3271  if (mOutGoodRegisters.GetByteCount() != mOutValues.GetByteCount())
3272  return false; // Sanity check failed: These sizes should match
3273  const ULWord * pRegArray (mOutGoodRegisters);
3274  ULWord * pValArray (mOutValues);
3275  for (ULWord ndx(0); ndx < mOutNumRegisters; ndx++)
3276  if (pRegArray[ndx] == inRegNum)
3277  {
3278  pValArray[ndx] = inValue;
3279  return true;
3280  }
3281  return false; // Not found
3282 }
3283 
3284 
3285 bool NTV2GetRegisters::GetRegisterValues (NTV2RegisterValueMap & outValues) const
3286 {
3287  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3288  outValues.clear ();
3289  if (!mOutGoodRegisters)
3290  return false; // Empty/null 'mOutGoodRegisters' array!
3291  if (!mOutNumRegisters)
3292  return false; // Driver says zero successfully read!
3293  if (mOutNumRegisters > mInNumRegisters)
3294  return false; // Sanity check failed: mOutNumRegisters must be less than or equal to mInNumRegisters!
3295  if (!mOutValues)
3296  return false; // Empty/null 'mOutValues' array!
3297  if (mOutGoodRegisters.GetByteCount() != mOutValues.GetByteCount())
3298  return false; // Sanity check failed: These sizes should match
3299 
3300  const ULWord * pRegArray (mOutGoodRegisters);
3301  const ULWord * pValArray (mOutValues);
3302  for (ULWord ndx(0); ndx < mOutNumRegisters; ndx++)
3303  {
3304  outValues [pRegArray[ndx]] = pValArray[ndx];
3305 #if 0 // Fake KONAIP25G from C4412G (see also CNTV2XXXXDriverInterface::ReadRegister):
3306  if (pRegArray[ndx] == kRegBoardID && pValArray[ndx] == DEVICE_ID_CORVID44_8K)
3307  outValues [pRegArray[ndx]] = DEVICE_ID_KONAIP_25G;
3308  else if (pRegArray[ndx] == kRegReserved83 || pRegArray[ndx] == kRegLPRJ45IP)
3309  outValues [pRegArray[ndx]] = 0x0A03FAD9; // Local IPv4 10.3.250.217
3310 #endif // 0
3311  }
3312  return true;
3313 }
3314 
3315 
3316 bool NTV2GetRegisters::GetRegisterValues (NTV2RegisterReads & outValues) const
3317 {
3318  NTV2RegisterValueMap regValMap;
3319  if (!GetRegisterValues(regValMap))
3320  return false;
3321 
3322  if (outValues.empty())
3323  {
3324  for (NTV2RegValueMapConstIter it(regValMap.begin()); it != regValMap.end(); ++it)
3325  {
3326  NTV2RegInfo regInfo(/*regNum*/it->first, /*regVal*/it->second);
3327 #if 0 // Fake KONAIP25G from C4412G (see also CNTV2XXXXDriverInterface::ReadRegister):
3328  if (regInfo.regNum() == kRegBoardID && regInfo.value() == DEVICE_ID_CORVID44_8K)
3329  regInfo.setValue(DEVICE_ID_KONAIP_25G);
3330  else if (regInfo.regNum() == kRegReserved83 || regInfo.regNum() == kRegLPRJ45IP)
3331  regInfo.setValue(0x0A03FAD9); // Local IPv4 10.3.250.217
3332 #endif // 0
3333  outValues.push_back(regInfo);
3334  }
3335  return true;
3336  }
3337  else
3338  {
3339  uint32_t missingTally(0);
3340  for (NTV2RegisterReadsIter it (outValues.begin()); it != outValues.end(); ++it)
3341  {
3342  NTV2RegValueMapConstIter mapIter(regValMap.find(it->registerNumber));
3343  if (mapIter != regValMap.end())
3344  it->registerValue = mapIter->second;
3345  else
3346  missingTally++; // Missing register
3347 
3348 #if 0 // Fake KONAIP25G from C4412G (see also CNTV2XXXXDriverInterface::ReadRegister):
3349  if (it->registerNumber == kRegBoardID && it->registerValue == DEVICE_ID_CORVID44_8K)
3350  it->registerValue = DEVICE_ID_KONAIP_25G;
3351  else if (it->registerNumber == kRegReserved83 || it->registerNumber == kRegLPRJ45IP)
3352  it->registerValue = 0x0A03FAD9; // Local IPv4 10.3.250.217
3353 #endif // 0
3354  }
3355  return !missingTally;
3356  }
3357 }
3358 
3359 
3360 ostream & NTV2GetRegisters::Print (ostream & inOutStream) const
3361 {
3362  inOutStream << mHeader << ", numRegs=" << mInNumRegisters << ", inRegs=" << mInRegisters << ", outNumGoodRegs=" << mOutNumRegisters
3363  << ", outGoodRegs=" << mOutGoodRegisters << ", outValues=" << mOutValues << ", " << mTrailer;
3364  return inOutStream;
3365 }
3366 
3367 
3368 NTV2SetRegisters::NTV2SetRegisters (const NTV2RegisterWrites & inRegWrites)
3369  : mHeader (NTV2_TYPE_SETREGS, sizeof(NTV2SetRegisters)),
3370  mInNumRegisters (ULWord(inRegWrites.size())),
3371  mOutNumFailures (0)
3372 {
3373  ResetUsing(inRegWrites);
3374 }
3375 
3376 
3377 bool NTV2SetRegisters::ResetUsing (const NTV2RegisterWrites & inRegWrites)
3378 {
3379  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3380  mInNumRegisters = ULWord(inRegWrites.size());
3381  mOutNumFailures = 0;
3382  const bool result (mInRegInfos.Allocate (mInNumRegisters * sizeof(NTV2RegInfo))
3383  && mOutBadRegIndexes.Allocate (mInNumRegisters * sizeof(UWord)));
3384  if (!result)
3385  return false;
3386 
3387  ULWord ndx (0);
3388  NTV2RegInfo * pRegInfoArray (mInRegInfos);
3389  UWord * pBadRegIndexes (mOutBadRegIndexes);
3390 
3391  for (NTV2RegisterWritesConstIter it(inRegWrites.begin()); it != inRegWrites.end(); ++it)
3392  {
3393  if (pBadRegIndexes)
3394  pBadRegIndexes[ndx] = 0;
3395  if (pRegInfoArray)
3396  pRegInfoArray[ndx++] = *it;
3397  }
3398  NTV2_ASSERT((ndx * sizeof(NTV2RegInfo)) == mInRegInfos.GetByteCount());
3399  NTV2_ASSERT((ndx * sizeof(UWord)) == mOutBadRegIndexes.GetByteCount());
3400  return result;
3401 }
3402 
3403 
3404 bool NTV2SetRegisters::GetFailedRegisterWrites (NTV2RegisterWrites & outFailedRegWrites) const
3405 {
3406  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3407  outFailedRegWrites.clear();
3408  return true;
3409 }
3410 
3411 bool NTV2SetRegisters::GetRequestedRegisterWrites (NTV2RegWrites & outRegWrites) const
3412 {
3413  outRegWrites.clear();
3414  if (!mInNumRegisters)
3415  return false;
3416  if (!mInRegInfos)
3417  return false;
3418 
3419  outRegWrites.reserve(size_t(mInNumRegisters));
3420  const NTV2RegInfo * pRegInfos(mInRegInfos);
3421  for (ULWord ndx(0); ndx < mInNumRegisters; ndx++)
3422  outRegWrites.push_back(pRegInfos[ndx]);
3423  return true;
3424 }
3425 
3426 ostream & NTV2SetRegisters::Print (ostream & oss) const
3427 {
3428  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3429  oss << mHeader << ": numRegs=" << mInNumRegisters << " inRegInfos=" << mInRegInfos << " numFailures=" << DEC(mOutNumFailures)
3430  << " outBadRegIndexes=" << mOutBadRegIndexes << ": " << mTrailer;
3431  const UWord * pBadRegIndexes (mOutBadRegIndexes);
3432  const UWord maxNumBadRegIndexes (UWord(mOutBadRegIndexes.GetByteCount() / sizeof(UWord)));
3433  const NTV2RegInfo * pRegInfoArray (mInRegInfos);
3434  const UWord maxNumRegInfos (UWord(mInRegInfos.GetByteCount() / sizeof(NTV2RegInfo)));
3435  if (pBadRegIndexes && maxNumBadRegIndexes && pRegInfoArray && maxNumRegInfos && mOutNumFailures)
3436  {
3437  oss << endl;
3438  for (UWord num(0); num < maxNumBadRegIndexes; num++)
3439  {
3440  const UWord badRegIndex (pBadRegIndexes[num]);
3441  if (badRegIndex < maxNumRegInfos)
3442  {
3443  const NTV2RegInfo & badRegInfo (pRegInfoArray[badRegIndex]);
3444  oss << "Failure " << num << ": " << badRegInfo << endl;
3445  }
3446  }
3447  }
3448  return oss;
3449 }
3450 
3451 
3452 bool NTV2RegInfo::operator < (const NTV2RegInfo & inRHS) const
3453 {
3454  typedef std::pair <ULWord, ULWord> ULWordPair;
3455  typedef std::pair <ULWordPair, ULWordPair> ULWordPairs;
3456  const ULWordPairs rhs (ULWordPair (inRHS.registerNumber, inRHS.registerValue), ULWordPair (inRHS.registerMask, inRHS.registerShift));
3457  const ULWordPairs mine(ULWordPair (registerNumber, registerValue), ULWordPair (registerMask, registerShift));
3458  return mine < rhs;
3459 }
3460 
3461 ostream & NTV2RegInfo::Print (ostream & oss, const bool inAsCode) const
3462 {
3463  if (inAsCode)
3464  return PrintCode(oss);
3465  const string regName (CNTV2RegisterExpert::GetDisplayName(NTV2RegisterNumber(registerNumber)));
3466  oss << "[" << regName << "|" << DEC(registerNumber) << ": val=" << xHEX0N(registerValue,8);
3467  if (registerMask != 0xFFFFFFFF)
3468  oss << " msk=" << xHEX0N(registerMask,8);
3469  if (registerShift)
3470  oss << " shf=" << DEC(registerShift);
3471  return oss << "]";
3472 }
3473 
3474 ostream & NTV2RegInfo::PrintCode (ostream & oss, const int inRadix, const NTV2DeviceID inDeviceID) const
3475 {
3476  const string regName (CNTV2RegisterExpert::GetDisplayName(NTV2RegisterNumber(registerNumber)));
3477  const bool readOnly (CNTV2RegisterExpert::IsReadOnly(registerNumber));
3478  const bool badName (regName.find(' ') != string::npos);
3479  if (readOnly)
3480  oss << "//\t";
3481  oss << "theDevice.WriteRegister (";
3482  if (badName)
3483  oss << DEC(registerNumber);
3484  else
3485  oss << regName;
3486  switch (inRadix)
3487  {
3488  case 2: oss << ", " << BIN032(registerValue); break;
3489  case 8: oss << ", " << OCT(registerValue); break;
3490  case 10: oss << ", " << DEC(registerValue); break;
3491  default: oss << ", " << xHEX0N(registerValue,8); break;
3492  }
3493  if (registerMask != 0xFFFFFFFF)
3494  switch (inRadix)
3495  {
3496  case 2: oss << ", " << BIN032(registerMask); break;
3497  case 8: oss << ", " << OCT(registerMask); break;
3498  case 10: oss << ", " << DEC(registerMask); break;
3499  default: oss << ", " << xHEX0N(registerMask,8); break;
3500  }
3501  if (registerShift)
3502  oss << ", " << DEC(registerShift);
3503  oss << "); // ";
3504  if (badName)
3505  oss << regName;
3506  else
3507  oss << "Reg " << DEC(registerNumber);
3508  // Decode the reg value...
3509  string info(CNTV2RegisterExpert::GetDisplayValue(registerNumber, registerValue, inDeviceID));
3510  if (!info.empty()) // and add to end of comment
3511  oss << " // " << aja::replace(info, "\n", ", ");
3512  return oss;
3513 }
3514 
3515 
3516 ostream & NTV2PrintULWordVector (const NTV2ULWordVector & inObj, ostream & inOutStream)
3517 {
3518  for (NTV2ULWordVector::const_iterator it(inObj.begin()); it != inObj.end(); ++it)
3519  inOutStream << " " << HEX0N(*it,8);
3520  return inOutStream;
3521 }

3523 
3524 ostream & NTV2PrintChannelList (const NTV2ChannelList & inObj, const bool inCompact, ostream & inOutStream)
3525 {
3526  inOutStream << (inCompact ? "Ch[" : "[");
3527  for (NTV2ChannelListConstIter it(inObj.begin()); it != inObj.end(); )
3528  {
3529  if (inCompact)
3530  inOutStream << DEC(*it+1);
3531  else
3532  inOutStream << ::NTV2ChannelToString(*it);
3533  if (++it != inObj.end())
3534  inOutStream << (inCompact ? "|" : ",");
3535  }
3536  return inOutStream << "]";
3537 }

3542  return oss.str();

3565 
3566 NTV2ChannelSet NTV2MakeChannelSet (const NTV2Channel inFirstChannel, const UWord inNumChannels)
3567 {
3568  NTV2ChannelSet result;
3569  for (NTV2Channel ch(inFirstChannel); ch < NTV2Channel(inFirstChannel+inNumChannels); ch = NTV2Channel(ch+1))
3570  if (NTV2_IS_VALID_CHANNEL(ch))
3571  result.insert(ch);
3572  return result;
3573 }
3574 
3575 NTV2ChannelSet NTV2MakeChannelSet (const NTV2ChannelList inChannels)
3576 {
3577  NTV2ChannelSet result;
3578  for (NTV2ChannelListConstIter it(inChannels.begin()); it != inChannels.end(); ++it)
3579  result.insert(*it);
3580  return result;
3581 }
3582 
3583 NTV2ChannelList NTV2MakeChannelList (const NTV2Channel inFirstChannel, const UWord inNumChannels)
3584 {
3585  NTV2ChannelList result;
3586  for (NTV2Channel ch(inFirstChannel); ch < NTV2Channel(inFirstChannel+inNumChannels); ch = NTV2Channel(ch+1))
3587  if (NTV2_IS_VALID_CHANNEL(ch))
3588  result.push_back(ch);
3589  return result;
3590 }

3624  for (NTV2AudioSystem audSys(inFirstAudioSystem); audSys < NTV2AudioSystem(inFirstAudioSystem+inCount); audSys = NTV2AudioSystem(audSys+1))
3625  if (NTV2_IS_VALID_AUDIO_SYSTEM(audSys))
3626  result.insert(audSys);

3629 
3630 NTV2RegNumSet GetRegisterNumbers (const NTV2RegReads & inRegInfos)
3631 {
3632  NTV2RegNumSet result;
3633  for (NTV2RegisterReadsConstIter it(inRegInfos.begin()); it != inRegInfos.end(); ++it)
3634  if (result.find(it->registerNumber) == result.end())
3635  result.insert(it->registerNumber);
3636  return result;
3637 }
3638 
3639 NTV2RegisterReadsConstIter FindFirstMatchingRegisterNumber (const uint32_t inRegNum, const NTV2RegisterReads & inRegInfos)
3640 {
3641  for (NTV2RegisterReadsConstIter iter(inRegInfos.begin()); iter != inRegInfos.end(); ++iter) // Ugh -- linear search
3642  if (iter->registerNumber == inRegNum)
3643  return iter;
3644  return inRegInfos.end();
3645 }

3650  return inObj.Print(inOutStream);

3655 {

3657  for (NTV2RegisterWritesConstIter iter (inObj.begin ()); iter != inObj.end (); ++iter)
3658  inOutStream << *iter << endl;
3659  return inOutStream;
3660 }

3662 
3663 NTV2BankSelGetSetRegs::NTV2BankSelGetSetRegs (const NTV2RegInfo & inBankSelect, const NTV2RegInfo & inOutRegInfo, const bool inDoWrite)
3664  : mHeader (NTV2_TYPE_BANKGETSET, sizeof (NTV2BankSelGetSetRegs)),
3665  mIsWriting (inDoWrite), // Default to reading
3666  mInBankInfos (sizeof(NTV2RegInfo)), // Room for one bank select
3667  mInRegInfos (sizeof(NTV2RegInfo)) // Room for one register read or write
3668 {
3669  NTV2RegInfo * pRegInfo (mInBankInfos);
3670  if (pRegInfo)
3671  *pRegInfo = inBankSelect; // Store bank select regInfo
3672  pRegInfo = mInRegInfos;
3673  if (pRegInfo)
3674  *pRegInfo = inOutRegInfo; // Store regInfo
3675  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3676 }
3677 
3678 
3679 NTV2RegInfo NTV2BankSelGetSetRegs::GetRegInfo (const UWord inIndex0) const
3680 {
3681  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3682  NTV2RegInfo result;
3683  if (mInRegInfos)
3684  {
3685  const NTV2RegInfo * pRegInfos (mInRegInfos);
3686  const ULWord maxNum (mInRegInfos.GetByteCount() / ULWord(sizeof(NTV2RegInfo)));
3687  if (ULWord(inIndex0) < maxNum)
3688  result = pRegInfos[inIndex0];
3689  }
3690  return result;
3691 }
3692 
3693 
3694 ostream & NTV2BankSelGetSetRegs::Print (ostream & oss) const
3695 {
3696  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3697  const NTV2RegInfo * pBankRegInfo (mInBankInfos);
3698  const NTV2RegInfo * pRegInfo (mInRegInfos);
3699  oss << mHeader << (mIsWriting ? " WRIT" : " READ") << " bankReg=";
3700  if (mInBankInfos) oss << *pBankRegInfo; else oss << "-";
3701  oss << " regInfos=";
3702  if (mInRegInfos) oss << *pRegInfo; else oss << "-";
3703  return oss;
3704 }

3706 
3707 NTV2VirtualData::NTV2VirtualData (const ULWord inTag, const void* inVirtualData, const size_t inVirtualDataSize, const bool inDoWrite)
3708  : mHeader (NTV2_TYPE_VIRTUAL_DATA_RW, sizeof (NTV2VirtualData)),
3709  mTag (inTag), // setup tag
3710  mIsWriting (inDoWrite), // setup write/read
3711  mVirtualData (inVirtualData, inVirtualDataSize) // setup virtual data
3712 {
3713  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3714 }

3716 
3717 ostream & NTV2VirtualData::Print (ostream & inOutStream) const
3718 {
3719  NTV2_ASSERT_STRUCT_VALID;
3720  inOutStream << mHeader << ", mTag=" << mTag << ", mIsWriting=" << mIsWriting;
3721  return inOutStream;
3722 }
3723 
3724 using namespace ntv2nub;
3725 
3726  /*********************************************************************************************************************
3727  RPC ENCODE/DECODE FUNCTIONS
3728  *********************************************************************************************************************/
3729  #define AsU8Ref(_x_) reinterpret_cast<uint8_t&>(_x_)
3730  #define AsU16Ref(_x_) reinterpret_cast<uint16_t&>(_x_)
3731  #define AsU32Ref(_x_) reinterpret_cast<uint32_t&>(_x_)
3732  #define AsU64Ref(_x_) reinterpret_cast<uint64_t&>(_x_)
3733 
3734  bool NTV2_HEADER::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
3735  {
3736  PUSHU32(fHeaderTag, outBlob); // ULWord fHeaderTag
3737  PUSHU32(fType, outBlob); // ULWord fType
3738  PUSHU32(fHeaderVersion, outBlob); // ULWord fHeaderVersion
3739  PUSHU32(fVersion, outBlob); // ULWord fVersion
3740  PUSHU32(fSizeInBytes, outBlob); // ULWord fSizeInBytes
3741  PUSHU32(fPointerSize, outBlob); // ULWord fPointerSize
3742  PUSHU32(fOperation, outBlob); // ULWord fOperation
3743  PUSHU32(fResultStatus, outBlob); // ULWord fResultStatus
3744  return true;
3745  }
3746 
3747  bool NTV2_HEADER::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
3748  { uint32_t v32(0);
3749  POPU32(fHeaderTag, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fHeaderTag
3750  POPU32(fType, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fType
3751  POPU32(fHeaderVersion, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fHeaderVersion
3752  POPU32(fVersion, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fVersion
3753  // Do not decode fSizeInBytes, use native size because size can vary based on OS specific struct padding
3754  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fSizeInBytes - dummy read
3755  POPU32(fPointerSize, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fPointerSize
3756  POPU32(fOperation, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fOperation
3757  POPU32(fResultStatus, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fResultStatus
3758  return true;
3759  }
3760 
3761  bool NTV2_TRAILER::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
3762  {
3763  PUSHU32(fTrailerVersion, outBlob); // ULWord fTrailerVersion
3764  PUSHU32(fTrailerTag, outBlob); // ULWord fTrailerTag
3765  return true;
3766  }
3767 
3768  bool NTV2_TRAILER::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
3769  {
3770  POPU32(fTrailerVersion, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fTrailerVersion
3771  POPU32(fTrailerTag, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fTrailerTag
3772  return true;
3773  }
3774 
3775 
3776  bool NTV2Buffer::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob, bool fillBuffer)
3777  {
3778  PUSHU32(fByteCount, outBlob); // ULWord fByteCount
3779  PUSHU32(fFlags, outBlob); // ULWord fFlags
3780  if (!IsNULL() && fillBuffer)
3781  AppendU8s(outBlob); // NOTE: My buffer content should already have been made BigEndian, if necessary
3782  return true;
3783  }
3784 
3785  bool NTV2Buffer::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex, bool fillBuffer)
3786  {
3787  ULWord byteCount(0), flags(0);
3788  POPU32(byteCount, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fByteCount
3789  POPU32(flags, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fFlags
3790  if (!Allocate(byteCount, flags & NTV2Buffer_PAGE_ALIGNED))
3791  return false;
3792  if (fillBuffer)
3793  {
3794  if ((inOutIndex + byteCount) > inBlob.size())
3795  return false; // past end of inBlob
3796  ::memcpy(GetHostPointer(), inBlob.data() + inOutIndex, byteCount); // Caller is responsible for byte-swapping if needed
3797  inOutIndex += byteCount;
3798  }
3799  return true;
3800  }
3801 
3802  // Created for DMATransfer, removed Allocate().
3803  bool NTV2Buffer::RPCDecodeNoAllocate (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
3804  {
3805  ULWord byteCount(0), flags(0);
3806  POPU32(byteCount, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fByteCount
3807  POPU32(flags, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fFlags
3808  if ((inOutIndex + byteCount) > inBlob.size())
3809  return false; // past end of inBlob
3810 
3811  ::memcpy(GetHostPointer(), inBlob.data() + inOutIndex, byteCount); // Caller is responsible for byte-swapping if needed
3812  inOutIndex += byteCount;
3813  return true;
3814  }
3815 
3816  bool NTV2GetRegisters::RPCEncodeClient (UByteSequence & outBlob)
3817  {
3818  const size_t totBytes (mHeader.GetSizeInBytes() // Header + natural size of all structs/fields inbetween + Trailer
3819  + mInRegisters.GetByteCount() + mOutGoodRegisters.GetByteCount() + mOutValues.GetByteCount()); // NTV2Buffer fields
3820  if (outBlob.capacity() < totBytes)
3821  outBlob.reserve(totBytes);
3822  if (!NTV2HostIsBigEndian)
3823  { // All of my NTV2Buffers store arrays of ULWords that must be BigEndian BEFORE encoding into outBlob...
3824  mInRegisters.ByteSwap32();
3825  }
3826  bool ok = mHeader.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_HEADER mHeader
3827  PUSHU32(mInNumRegisters, outBlob); // ULWord mInNumRegisters
3828  ok &= mInRegisters.RPCEncode(outBlob, /*fillbuffer=*/true); // NTV2Buffer mInRegisters
3829  PUSHU32(mOutNumRegisters, outBlob); // ULWord mOutNumRegisters
3830  ok &= mOutGoodRegisters.RPCEncode(outBlob, /*fillbuffer=*/false) // NTV2Buffer mOutGoodRegisters
3831  && mOutValues.RPCEncode(outBlob, /*fillbuffer=*/false) // NTV2Buffer mOutValues
3832  && mTrailer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_TRAILER mTrailer
3833  if (!NTV2HostIsBigEndian && !ok)
3834  { // FAILED: Un-byteswap NTV2Buffer data...
3835  mInRegisters.ByteSwap32();
3836  }
3837  return ok;
3838  }
3839 
3840  bool NTV2GetRegisters::RPCDecodeServer (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
3841  {
3842  bool ok = mHeader.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_HEADER mHeader
3843  if (!ok) return false;
3844  POPU32(mInNumRegisters, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord mInNumRegisters
3845  ok &= mInRegisters.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex, /*fillbuffer=*/true); // NTV2Buffer mInRegisters
3846  POPU32(mOutNumRegisters, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord mOutNumRegisters
3847  ok &= mOutGoodRegisters.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex, /*fillbuffer=*/false); // NTV2Buffer mOutGoodRegisters
3848  ok &= mOutValues.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex, /*fillbuffer=*/false); // NTV2Buffer mOutValues
3849  ok &= mTrailer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_TRAILER mTrailer
3850  if (!NTV2HostIsBigEndian)
3851  { // Re-byteswap NTV2Buffer data after decoding...
3852  mInRegisters.ByteSwap32();
3853  }
3854  return ok;
3855  }
3856 
3857  bool NTV2GetRegisters::RPCEncodeServer (UByteSequence & outBlob)
3858  {
3859  const size_t totBytes (mHeader.GetSizeInBytes() // Header + natural size of all structs/fields inbetween + Trailer
3860  + mInRegisters.GetByteCount() + mOutGoodRegisters.GetByteCount() + mOutValues.GetByteCount()); // NTV2Buffer fields
3861  if (outBlob.capacity() < totBytes)
3862  outBlob.reserve(totBytes);
3863  if (!NTV2HostIsBigEndian)
3864  { // All of my NTV2Buffers store arrays of ULWords that must be BigEndian BEFORE encoding into outBlob...
3865  mOutGoodRegisters.ByteSwap32();
3866  mOutValues.ByteSwap32();
3867  }
3868  bool ok = mHeader.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_HEADER mHeader
3869  PUSHU32(mInNumRegisters, outBlob); // ULWord mInNumRegisters
3870  ok &= mInRegisters.RPCEncode(outBlob, /*fillbuffer=*/false); // NTV2Buffer mInRegisters
3871  PUSHU32(mOutNumRegisters, outBlob); // ULWord mOutNumRegisters
3872  ok &= mOutGoodRegisters.RPCEncode(outBlob, /*fillbuffer=*/true) // NTV2Buffer mOutGoodRegisters
3873  && mOutValues.RPCEncode(outBlob, /*fillbuffer=*/true) // NTV2Buffer mOutValues
3874  && mTrailer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_TRAILER mTrailer
3875  if (!NTV2HostIsBigEndian && !ok)
3876  { // FAILED: Un-byteswap NTV2Buffer data...
3877  mOutGoodRegisters.ByteSwap32();
3878  mOutValues.ByteSwap32();
3879  }
3880  return ok;
3881  }
3882 
3883  bool NTV2GetRegisters::RPCDecodeClient (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
3884  {
3885  bool ok = mHeader.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_HEADER mHeader
3886  if (!ok) return false;
3887  POPU32(mInNumRegisters, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord mInNumRegisters
3888  ok &= mInRegisters.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex, /*fillbuffer=*/false); // NTV2Buffer mInRegisters
3889  POPU32(mOutNumRegisters, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord mOutNumRegisters
3890  ok &= mOutGoodRegisters.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex, /*fillbuffer=*/true); // NTV2Buffer mOutGoodRegisters
3891  ok &= mOutValues.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex, /*fillbuffer=*/true); // NTV2Buffer mOutValues
3892  ok &= mTrailer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_TRAILER mTrailer
3893  if (!NTV2HostIsBigEndian)
3894  { // Re-byteswap NTV2Buffer data after decoding...
3895  mOutGoodRegisters.ByteSwap32();
3896  mOutValues.ByteSwap32();
3897  }
3898  return ok;
3899  }
3900 
3901  bool NTV2SetRegisters::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
3902  {
3903  const size_t totBytes (mHeader.GetSizeInBytes() // Header + natural size of all structs/fields inbetween + Trailer
3904  + mInRegInfos.GetByteCount() + mOutBadRegIndexes.GetByteCount()); // NTV2Buffer fields
3905  if (outBlob.capacity() < totBytes)
3906  outBlob.reserve(totBytes);
3907  if (!NTV2HostIsBigEndian)
3908  { // All of my NTV2Buffers store arrays of ULWords that must be BigEndian BEFORE encoding into outBlob...
3909  mInRegInfos.ByteSwap32();
3910  mOutBadRegIndexes.ByteSwap32();
3911  }
3912  bool ok = mHeader.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_HEADER mHeader
3913  PUSHU32(mInNumRegisters, outBlob); // ULWord mInNumRegisters
3914  ok &= mInRegInfos.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2Buffer mInRegInfos
3915  PUSHU32(mOutNumFailures, outBlob); // ULWord mOutNumFailures
3916  ok &= mOutBadRegIndexes.RPCEncode(outBlob) // NTV2Buffer mOutBadRegIndexes
3917  && mTrailer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_TRAILER mTrailer
3918  if (!NTV2HostIsBigEndian && !ok)
3919  { // FAILED: Un-byteswap NTV2Buffer data...
3920  mInRegInfos.ByteSwap32();
3921  mOutBadRegIndexes.ByteSwap16();
3922  }
3923  return ok;
3924  }
3925 
3926  bool NTV2SetRegisters::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
3927  {
3928  bool ok = mHeader.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_HEADER mHeader
3929  POPU32(mInNumRegisters, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord mInNumRegisters
3930  ok &= mInRegInfos.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Buffer mInRegInfos
3931  POPU32(mOutNumFailures, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord mOutNumFailures
3932  ok &= mOutBadRegIndexes.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Buffer mOutBadRegIndexes
3933  ok &= mTrailer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_TRAILER mTrailer
3934  if (!NTV2HostIsBigEndian)
3935  { // Re-byteswap NTV2Buffer data after decoding...
3936  mInRegInfos.ByteSwap32();
3937  mOutBadRegIndexes.ByteSwap16();
3938  }
3939  return ok;
3940  }
3941 
3942  bool NTV2BankSelGetSetRegs::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
3943  {
3944  const size_t totBytes (mHeader.GetSizeInBytes() // Header + natural size of all structs/fields inbetween + Trailer
3945  + mInBankInfos.GetByteCount() + mInRegInfos.GetByteCount()); // NTV2Buffer fields
3946  if (outBlob.capacity() < totBytes)
3947  outBlob.reserve(totBytes);
3948  if (!NTV2HostIsBigEndian)
3949  { // All of my NTV2Buffers store arrays of ULWords that must be BigEndian BEFORE encoding into outBlob...
3950  mInBankInfos.ByteSwap32();
3951  mInRegInfos.ByteSwap32();
3952  }
3953  bool ok = mHeader.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_HEADER mHeader
3954  PUSHU32(mIsWriting, outBlob); // ULWord mIsWriting
3955  ok &= mInBankInfos.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2Buffer mInBankInfos
3956  ok &= mInRegInfos.RPCEncode(outBlob) // NTV2Buffer mInRegInfos
3957  && mTrailer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_TRAILER mTrailer
3958  if (!NTV2HostIsBigEndian && !ok)
3959  { // FAILED: Un-byteswap NTV2Buffer data...
3960  mInBankInfos.ByteSwap32();
3961  mInRegInfos.ByteSwap32();
3962  }
3963  return ok;
3964  }
3965 
3966  bool NTV2BankSelGetSetRegs::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
3967  {
3968  bool ok = mHeader.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_HEADER mHeader
3969  POPU32(mIsWriting, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord mIsWriting
3970  ok &= mInBankInfos.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Buffer mInBankInfos
3971  ok &= mInRegInfos.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Buffer mInRegInfos
3972  ok &= mTrailer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_TRAILER mTrailer
3973  if (!NTV2HostIsBigEndian)
3974  { // Re-byteswap NTV2Buffer data after decoding...
3975  mInBankInfos.ByteSwap32();
3976  mInRegInfos.ByteSwap32();
3977  }
3978  return ok;
3979  }
3980 
3981  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
3982  {
3983  const size_t totBytes (acHeader.GetSizeInBytes()); // Header + natural size of all structs/fields inbetween + Trailer
3984  if (outBlob.capacity() < totBytes)
3985  outBlob.reserve(totBytes);
3986  bool ok = acHeader.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_HEADER acHeader
3987  PUSHU16(UWord(acCrosspoint), outBlob); // NTV2Crosspoint acCrosspoint
3988  PUSHU16(UWord(acState), outBlob); // NTV2AutoCirculateState acState
3989  PUSHU32(ULWord(acStartFrame), outBlob); // LWord acStartFrame
3990  PUSHU32(ULWord(acEndFrame), outBlob); // LWord acEndFrame
3991  PUSHU32(ULWord(acActiveFrame), outBlob); // LWord acActiveFrame
3992  PUSHU64(acRDTSCStartTime, outBlob); // ULWord64 acRDTSCStartTime
3993  PUSHU64(acAudioClockStartTime, outBlob); // ULWord64 acAudioClockStartTime
3994  PUSHU64(acRDTSCCurrentTime, outBlob); // ULWord64 acRDTSCCurrentTime
3995  PUSHU64(acAudioClockCurrentTime, outBlob); // ULWord64 acAudioClockCurrentTime
3996  PUSHU32(acFramesProcessed, outBlob); // ULWord acFramesProcessed
3997  PUSHU32(acFramesDropped, outBlob); // ULWord acFramesDeopped
3998  PUSHU32(acBufferLevel, outBlob); // ULWord acBufferLevel
3999  PUSHU32(acOptionFlags, outBlob); // ULWord acOptionFlags
4000  PUSHU16(UWord(acAudioSystem), outBlob); // NTV2AudioSystem acAudioSystem
4001  ok &= acTrailer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_TRAILER acTrailer
4002  return ok;
4003  }
4004 
4005  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
4006  { uint16_t v16(0); uint32_t v32(0);
4007  bool ok = acHeader.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_HEADER acHeader
4008  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Crosspoint acCrosspoint
4009  acCrosspoint = NTV2Crosspoint(v16);
4010  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2AutoCirculateState acState
4011  acState = NTV2AutoCirculateState(v16);
4012  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord acStartFrame
4013  acStartFrame = LWord(v32);
4014  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord acEndFrame
4015  acEndFrame = LWord(v32);
4016  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord acActiveFrame
4017  acActiveFrame = LWord(v32);
4018  POPU64(acRDTSCStartTime, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 acRDTSCStartTime
4019  POPU64(acAudioClockStartTime, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 acAudioClockStartTime
4020  POPU64(acRDTSCCurrentTime, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 acRDTSCCurrentTime
4021  POPU64(acAudioClockCurrentTime, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 acAudioClockCurrentTime
4022  POPU32(acFramesProcessed, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acFramesProcessed
4023  POPU32(acFramesDropped, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acFramesDropped
4024  POPU32(acBufferLevel, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acBufferLevel
4025  POPU32(acOptionFlags, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acOptionFlags
4026  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2AudioSystem acAudioSystem
4027  acAudioSystem = NTV2AudioSystem(v16);
4028  ok &= acTrailer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_TRAILER acTrailer
4029  return ok;
4030  }
4031 
4032  bool FRAME_STAMP::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
4033  {
4034  const size_t totBytes (acHeader.GetSizeInBytes()); // Header + natural size of all structs/fields inbetween + Trailer
4035  if (outBlob.capacity() < totBytes)
4036  outBlob.reserve(totBytes);
4037  bool ok = acHeader.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_HEADER acHeader
4038  PUSHU64(ULWord64(acFrameTime), outBlob); // LWord64 acFrameTime
4039  PUSHU32(acRequestedFrame, outBlob); // ULWord acRequestedFrame
4040  PUSHU64(acAudioClockTimeStamp, outBlob); // ULWord64 acAudioClockTimeStamp
4041  PUSHU32(acAudioExpectedAddress, outBlob); // ULWord acAudioExpectedAddress
4042  PUSHU32(acAudioInStartAddress, outBlob); // ULWord acAudioInStartAddress
4043  PUSHU32(acAudioInStopAddress, outBlob); // ULWord acAudioInStopAddress
4044  PUSHU32(acAudioOutStopAddress, outBlob); // ULWord acAudioOutStopAddress
4045  PUSHU32(acAudioOutStartAddress, outBlob); // ULWord acAudioOutStartAddress
4046  PUSHU32(acTotalBytesTransferred, outBlob); // ULWord acTotalBytesTransferred
4047  PUSHU32(acStartSample, outBlob); // ULWord acStartSample
4048 
4049  ok &= acTimeCodes.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2Buffer acTimeCodes
4050  PUSHU64(ULWord64(acCurrentTime), outBlob); // LWord64 acCurrentTime
4051  PUSHU32(acCurrentFrame, outBlob); // ULWord acCurrentFrame
4052  PUSHU64(ULWord64(acCurrentFrameTime), outBlob); // LWord64 acCurrentFrameTime
4053  PUSHU64(acAudioClockCurrentTime, outBlob); // ULWord64 acAudioClockCurrentTime
4054  PUSHU32(acCurrentAudioExpectedAddress, outBlob); // ULWord acCurrentAudioExpectedAddress
4055  PUSHU32(acCurrentAudioStartAddress, outBlob); // ULWord acCurrentAudioStartAddress
4056  PUSHU32(acCurrentFieldCount, outBlob); // ULWord acCurrentFieldCount
4057  PUSHU32(acCurrentLineCount, outBlob); // ULWord acCurrentLineCount
4058  PUSHU32(acCurrentReps, outBlob); // ULWord acCurrentReps
4059  PUSHU64(acCurrentUserCookie, outBlob); // ULWord64 acCurrentUserCookie
4060  PUSHU32(acFrame, outBlob); // ULWord acFrame
4061  PUSHU32(acRP188.fDBB, outBlob); // ULWord acRP188.fDBB
4062  PUSHU32(acRP188.fLo, outBlob); // ULWord acRP188.fLo
4063  PUSHU32(acRP188.fHi, outBlob); // ULWord acRP188.fHi
4064  ok &= acTrailer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_TRAILER acTrailer
4065  return ok;
4066  }
4067

4069  { uint64_t v64(0);

4072  acFrameTime = LWord64(v64);

4074  POPU64(acAudioClockTimeStamp, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 acAudioClockTimeStamp

4077  POPU32(acAudioInStopAddress, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acAudioInStopAddress
4078  POPU32(acAudioOutStopAddress, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acAudioOutStopAddress
4079  POPU32(acAudioOutStartAddress, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acAudioOutStartAddress

4082

4085  acCurrentTime = LWord64(v64);
4086  POPU32(acCurrentFrame, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acCurrentFrame
4087  POPU64(v64, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord64 acCurrentFrameTime
4088  acCurrentFrameTime = LWord64(v64);
4089  POPU64(acAudioClockCurrentTime, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 acAudioClockCurrentTime
4090  POPU32(acCurrentAudioExpectedAddress, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acCurrentAudioExpectedAddress
4091  POPU32(acCurrentAudioStartAddress, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acCurrentAudioStartAddress
4092  POPU32(acCurrentFieldCount, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acCurrentFieldCount
4093  POPU32(acCurrentLineCount, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acCurrentLineCount

4095  POPU64(acCurrentUserCookie, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 acCurrentUserCookie
4096  POPU32(acFrame, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acFrame

4098  POPU32(acRP188.fLo, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acRP188.fLo
4099  POPU32(acRP188.fHi, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acRP188.fHi
4100  ok &= acTrailer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_TRAILER acTrailer
4101  return ok;
4102  }
4103 
4104  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER_STATUS::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
4105  {
4106  const size_t totBytes (acHeader.GetSizeInBytes()); // Header + natural size of all structs/fields inbetween + Trailer
4107  if (outBlob.capacity() < totBytes)
4108  outBlob.reserve(totBytes);
4109  bool ok = acHeader.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_HEADER acHeader
4110  PUSHU16(acState, outBlob); // UWord acState
4111  PUSHU32(ULWord(acTransferFrame), outBlob); // LWord acTransferFrame
4112  PUSHU32(acBufferLevel, outBlob); // ULWord acBufferLevel
4113  PUSHU32(acFramesProcessed, outBlob); // ULWord acFramesProcessed
4114  PUSHU32(acFramesDropped, outBlob); // ULWord acFramesDropped
4115  ok &= acFrameStamp.RPCEncode(outBlob); // FRAME_STAMP acFrameStamp
4116  PUSHU32(acAudioTransferSize, outBlob); // ULWord acAudioTransferSize
4117  PUSHU32(acAudioStartSample, outBlob); // ULWord acAudioStartSample
4118  PUSHU32(acAncTransferSize, outBlob); // ULWord acAncTransferSize
4119  PUSHU32(acAncField2TransferSize, outBlob); // ULWord acAncField2TransferSize
4120  ok &= acTrailer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_TRAILER acTrailer
4121  return ok;
4122  }
4123 
4124  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER_STATUS::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
4125  { uint16_t v16(0); uint32_t v32(0);
4126  bool ok = acHeader.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_HEADER acHeader
4127  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2AutoCirculateState acState
4128  acState = NTV2AutoCirculateState(v16);
4129  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord acTransferFrame
4130  acTransferFrame = LWord(v32);
4131  POPU32(acBufferLevel, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acBufferLevel
4132  POPU32(acFramesProcessed, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acFramesProcessed
4133  POPU32(acFramesDropped, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acFramesDropped
4134  ok &= acFrameStamp.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // FRAME_STAMP acFrameStamp
4135  POPU32(acAudioTransferSize, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acAudioTransferSize
4136  POPU32(acAudioStartSample, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acAudioStartSample
4137  POPU32(acAncTransferSize, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acAncTransferSize
4138  POPU32(acAncField2TransferSize, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acAncField2TransferSize
4139  ok &= acTrailer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_TRAILER acTrailer
4140  return ok;
4141  }

4147  PUSHU32(acSegmentHostPitch, outBlob); // ULWord acSegmentHostPitch
4148  PUSHU32(acSegmentDevicePitch, outBlob); // ULWord acSegmentDevicePitch
4149  return true;

4176  bool AutoCircVidProcInfo::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
4177  {
4178  PUSHU16(mode, outBlob); // AutoCircVidProcMode mode
4179  PUSHU16(foregroundVideoCrosspoint, outBlob); // NTV2Crosspoint foregroundVideoCrosspoint
4180  PUSHU16(backgroundVideoCrosspoint, outBlob); // NTV2Crosspoint backgroundVideoCrosspoint
4181  PUSHU16(foregroundKeyCrosspoint, outBlob); // NTV2Crosspoint foregroundKeyCrosspoint
4182  PUSHU16(backgroundKeyCrosspoint, outBlob); // NTV2Crosspoint backgroundKeyCrosspoint
4183  PUSHU32(ULWord(transitionCoefficient), outBlob); // Fixed_ transitionCoefficient
4184  PUSHU32(ULWord(transitionSoftness), outBlob); // Fixed_ transitionSoftness
4185  return true;
4186  }
4187 
4188  bool AutoCircVidProcInfo::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
4189  { uint16_t v16(0); uint32_t v32(0);
4190  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // AutoCircVidProcMode mode
4191  mode = AutoCircVidProcMode(v16);
4192  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Crosspoint foregroundVideoCrosspoint
4193  foregroundVideoCrosspoint = NTV2Crosspoint(v16);
4194  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Crosspoint backgroundVideoCrosspoint
4195  backgroundVideoCrosspoint = NTV2Crosspoint(v16);
4196  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Crosspoint foregroundKeyCrosspoint
4197  foregroundKeyCrosspoint = NTV2Crosspoint(v16);
4198  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Crosspoint backgroundKeyCrosspoint
4199  backgroundKeyCrosspoint = NTV2Crosspoint(v16);
4200  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // Fixed_ transitionCoefficient
4201  transitionCoefficient = Fixed_(v32);
4202  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // Fixed_ transitionSoftness
4203  transitionSoftness = Fixed_(v32);
4204  return true;
4205  }
