4207  bool NTV2_RP188::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
4208  {
4209  PUSHU32(fDBB, outBlob); // ULWord fDBB
4210  PUSHU32(fLo, outBlob); // ULWord fLo
4211  PUSHU32(fHi, outBlob); // ULWord fHi
4212  return true;
4213  }
4214 
4215  bool NTV2_RP188::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
4216  {
4217  POPU32(fDBB, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fDBB
4218  POPU32(fLo, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fLo
4219  POPU32(fHi, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord fHi
4220  return true;
4221  }
4222 
4223  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
4224  {
4225  AJADebug::StatTimerStart(AJA_DebugStat_ACXferRPCEncode);
4226  const size_t totBytes (acHeader.GetSizeInBytes() + acVideoBuffer.GetByteCount() + acAudioBuffer.GetByteCount()
4227  + acANCBuffer.GetByteCount() + acANCField2Buffer.GetByteCount() + acOutputTimeCodes.GetByteCount()
4228  + acHDMIAuxData.GetByteCount() + 64); // Header + natural size of all structs/fields inbetween + Trailer
4229  if (outBlob.capacity() < totBytes)
4230  outBlob.reserve(totBytes);
4231  bool ok = acHeader.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_HEADER acHeader
4232  ok &= acVideoBuffer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2Buffer acVideoBuffer
4233  ok &= acAudioBuffer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2Buffer acAudioBuffer
4234  ok &= acANCBuffer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2Buffer acANCBuffer
4235  ok &= acANCField2Buffer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2Buffer acANCField2Buffer
4236  ok &= acOutputTimeCodes.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2Buffer acOutputTimeCodes
4237  ok &= acTransferStatus.RPCEncode(outBlob); // AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER_STATUS acTransferStatus
4238  PUSHU64(acInUserCookie, outBlob); // ULWord64 acInUserCookie
4239  PUSHU32(acInVideoDMAOffset, outBlob); // ULWord acInVideoDMAOffset
4240  ok &= acInSegmentedDMAInfo.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2SegmentedDMAInfo acInSegmentedDMAInfo
4241  ok &= acColorCorrection.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2ColorCorrectionData acColorCorrection
4242  PUSHU16(acFrameBufferFormat, outBlob); // NTV2PixelFormat acFrameBufferFormat
4243  PUSHU16(acFrameBufferOrientation, outBlob); // NTV2FBOrientation acFrameBufferOrientation
4244  ok &= acVidProcInfo.RPCEncode(outBlob); // AutoCircVidProcInfo acVidProcInfo
4245  PUSHU16(acVideoQuarterSizeExpand, outBlob); // NTV2QtrSizeExpandMode acVideoQuarterSizeExpand
4246  ok &= acHDMIAuxData.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2Buffer acHDMIAuxData
4247  PUSHU32(acPeerToPeerFlags, outBlob); // ULWord acPeerToPeerFlags
4248  PUSHU32(acFrameRepeatCount, outBlob); // ULWord acFrameRepeatCount
4249  PUSHU32(ULWord(acDesiredFrame), outBlob); // LWord acDesiredFrame
4250  ok &= acRP188.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_RP188 acRP188
4251  PUSHU16(acCrosspoint, outBlob); // NTV2Crosspoint acCrosspoint
4252  ok &= acTrailer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_TRAILER acTrailer
4253  AJADebug::StatTimerStop(AJA_DebugStat_ACXferRPCEncode);
4254  return ok;
4255  }
4256 
4257  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
4258  { uint16_t v16(0); uint32_t v32(0);
4259  AJADebug::StatTimerStart(AJA_DebugStat_ACXferRPCDecode);
4260  bool ok = acHeader.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_HEADER acHeader
4261  ok &= acVideoBuffer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Buffer acVideoBuffer
4262  ok &= acAudioBuffer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Buffer acAudioBuffer
4263  ok &= acANCBuffer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Buffer acANCBuffer
4264  ok &= acANCField2Buffer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Buffer acANCField2Buffer
4265  ok &= acOutputTimeCodes.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Buffer acOutputTimeCodes
4266  ok &= acTransferStatus.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER_STATUS acTransferStatus
4267  POPU64(acInUserCookie, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 acInUserCookie
4268  POPU32(acInVideoDMAOffset, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acInVideoDMAOffset
4269  ok &= acInSegmentedDMAInfo.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex);// NTV2Buffer acInSegmentedDMAInfo
4270  ok &= acColorCorrection.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Buffer acColorCorrection
4271  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2PixelFormat acFrameBufferFormat
4272  acFrameBufferFormat = NTV2FrameBufferFormat(v16);
4273  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2FBOrientation acFrameBufferOrientation
4274  acFrameBufferOrientation = NTV2FBOrientation(v16);
4275  ok &= acVidProcInfo.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // AutoCircVidProcInfo acVidProcInfo
4276  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2QtrSizeExpandMode acVideoQuarterSizeExpand
4277  acVideoQuarterSizeExpand = NTV2QtrSizeExpandMode(v16);
4278  ok &= acHDMIAuxData.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Buffer acHDMIAuxData
4279  POPU32(acPeerToPeerFlags, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acPeerToPeerFlags
4280  POPU32(acFrameRepeatCount, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord acFrameRepeatCount
4281  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord acDesiredFrame
4282  acDesiredFrame = LWord(v32);
4283  ok &= acRP188.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_RP188 acRP188
4284  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Crosspoint acCrosspoint
4285  acCrosspoint = NTV2Crosspoint(v16);
4286  ok &= acTrailer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_TRAILER acTrailer
4287  AJADebug::StatTimerStop(AJA_DebugStat_ACXferRPCDecode);
4288  return ok;
4289  }
4290 
4291  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER_STRUCT::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
4292  {
4293  NTV2Buffer buff;
4294  PUSHU16(UWord(channelSpec), outBlob); // NTV2Crosspoint channelSpec
4295 // PUSHU64(ULWord64(videoBuffer), outBlob) // ULWord * videoBuffer
4296  PUSHU32(videoBufferSize, outBlob); // ULWord videoBufferSize
4297  if (videoBuffer && videoBufferSize)
4298  { buff.Set(videoBuffer, videoBufferSize);
4299  buff.AppendU8s(outBlob);
4300  }
4301  PUSHU32(videoDmaOffset, outBlob); // ULWord videoDmaOffset
4302 // PUSHU64(ULWord64(audioBuffer), outBlob) // ULWord * audioBuffer
4303  PUSHU32(audioBufferSize, outBlob); // ULWord audioBufferSize
4304  if (audioBuffer && audioBufferSize)
4305  { buff.Set(audioBuffer, audioBufferSize);
4306  buff.AppendU8s(outBlob);
4307  }
4308  PUSHU32(audioStartSample, outBlob); // ULWord audioStartSample
4309  PUSHU32(audioNumChannels, outBlob); // ULWord audioNumChannels
4310  PUSHU32(frameRepeatCount, outBlob); // ULWord frameRepeatCount
4311  rp188.RPCEncode(outBlob); // RP188_STRUCT rp188
4312  PUSHU32(ULWord(desiredFrame), outBlob); // LWord desiredFrame
4313  PUSHU32(hUser, outBlob); // ULWord hUser
4314  PUSHU32(transferFlags, outBlob); // ULWord transferFlags
4315  PUSHU8(bDisableExtraAudioInfo, outBlob); // BOOL_ bDisableExtraAudioInfo
4316  PUSHU16(UWord(frameBufferFormat), outBlob); // NTV2PixelFormat frameBufferFormat
4317  PUSHU16(UWord(frameBufferOrientation), outBlob); // NTV2FBOrientation frameBufferOrientation
4318  // Skip color correction for now // NTV2ColorCorrectionInfo colorCorrectionInfo
4319  vidProcInfo.RPCEncode(outBlob); // AutoCircVidProcInfo vidProcInfo
4320  PUSHU32(customAncInfo.Group1, outBlob); // CUSTOM_ANC_STRUCT customAncInfo
4321  PUSHU32(customAncInfo.Group2, outBlob);
4322  PUSHU32(customAncInfo.Group3, outBlob);
4323  PUSHU32(customAncInfo.Group4, outBlob);
4324  PUSHU32(videoNumSegments, outBlob); // ULWord videoNumSegments
4325  PUSHU32(videoSegmentHostPitch, outBlob); // ULWord videoSegmentHostPitch
4326  PUSHU32(videoSegmentCardPitch, outBlob); // ULWord videoSegmentCardPitch
4327  PUSHU16(UWord(videoQuarterSizeExpand), outBlob); // NTV2QtrSizeExpandMode videoQuarterSizeExpand
4328  return true;
4329  }
4330 
4331  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER_STRUCT::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
4332  { UWord v16(0); ULWord v32(0);
4333  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Crosspoint channelSpec
4334  channelSpec = NTV2Crosspoint(v16);
4335 // POPU64(u64, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord * videoBuffer
4336 // videoBuffer = reinterpret_cast<ULWord*>(u64);
4337  POPU32(videoBufferSize, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord videoBufferSize
4338  if (videoBufferSize && !videoBuffer)
4339  {
4340  videoBuffer = reinterpret_cast<ULWord*>(AJAMemory::AllocateAligned(videoBufferSize, NTV2Buffer::DefaultPageSize()));
4341  if (!videoBuffer)
4342  return false;
4343  if ((inOutIndex + videoBufferSize) >= inBlob.size())
4344  return false; // past end of inBlob
4345  UByte* pBuffer = reinterpret_cast<UByte*>(videoBuffer);
4346  for (ULWord cnt(0); cnt < videoBufferSize; cnt++)
4347  pBuffer[cnt] = inBlob.at(inOutIndex++); // Caller is responsible for byte-swapping if needed
4348  }
4349  POPU32(videoDmaOffset, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord videoDmaOffset
4350 // POPU64(u64, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord * audioBuffer
4351 // audioBuffer = reinterpret_cast<ULWord*>(u64);
4352  POPU32(audioBufferSize, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord audioBufferSize
4353  if (audioBufferSize && !audioBuffer)
4354  {
4355  audioBuffer = reinterpret_cast<ULWord*>(AJAMemory::AllocateAligned(audioBufferSize, NTV2Buffer::DefaultPageSize()));
4356  if (!audioBuffer)
4357  return false;
4358  if ((inOutIndex + audioBufferSize) >= inBlob.size())
4359  return false; // past end of inBlob
4360  UByte* pBuffer = reinterpret_cast<UByte*>(audioBuffer);
4361  for (ULWord cnt(0); cnt < audioBufferSize; cnt++)
4362  pBuffer[cnt] = inBlob.at(inOutIndex++); // Caller is responsible for byte-swapping if needed
4363  }
4364  POPU32(audioStartSample, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord audioStartSample
4365  POPU32(audioNumChannels, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord audioNumChannels
4366  POPU32(frameRepeatCount, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord frameRepeatCount
4367  rp188.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // RP188_STRUCT rp188
4368  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord desiredFrame
4369  desiredFrame = LWord(v32);
4370  POPU32(hUser, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord hUser
4371  POPU32(transferFlags, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord transferFlags
4372  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bDisableExtraAudioInfo), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bDisableExtraAudioInfo
4373  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2PixelFormat frameBufferFormat
4374  frameBufferFormat = NTV2PixelFormat(v16);
4375  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2FBOrientation frameBufferOrientation
4376  frameBufferOrientation = NTV2FBOrientation(v16);
4377  // Skip color correction for now // NTV2ColorCorrectionInfo colorCorrectionInfo
4378  vidProcInfo.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // AutoCircVidProcInfo vidProcInfo
4379  POPU32(customAncInfo.Group1, inBlob, inOutIndex); // CUSTOM_ANC_STRUCT customAncInfo
4380  POPU32(customAncInfo.Group2, inBlob, inOutIndex);
4381  POPU32(customAncInfo.Group3, inBlob, inOutIndex);
4382  POPU32(customAncInfo.Group4, inBlob, inOutIndex);
4383  POPU32(videoNumSegments, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord videoNumSegments
4384  POPU32(videoSegmentHostPitch, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord videoSegmentHostPitch
4385  POPU32(videoSegmentCardPitch, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord videoSegmentCardPitch
4386  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2QtrSizeExpandMode videoQuarterSizeExpand
4387  videoQuarterSizeExpand = NTV2QtrSizeExpandMode(v16);
4388  return true;
4389  }
4390 
4391  bool NTV2Bitstream::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
4392  {
4393  const size_t totBytes (mHeader.GetSizeInBytes()); // Header + natural size of all structs/fields inbetween + Trailer
4394  if (outBlob.capacity() < totBytes)
4395  outBlob.reserve(totBytes);
4396  bool ok = mHeader.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_HEADER mHeader
4397  ok &= mBuffer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2Buffer mBuffer
4398  PUSHU32(mFlags, outBlob); // ULWord mFlags
4399  PUSHU32(mStatus, outBlob); // ULWord mStatus
4400  for (size_t ndx(0); ndx < 16; ndx++)
4401  PUSHU32(mRegisters[ndx], outBlob); // ULWord mRegisters[16]
4402  for (size_t ndx(0); ndx < 32; ndx++)
4403  PUSHU32(mReserved[ndx], outBlob); // ULWord mReserved[32]
4404  ok &= mTrailer.RPCEncode(outBlob); // NTV2_TRAILER mTrailer
4405  return ok;
4406  }
4407 
4408  bool NTV2Bitstream::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
4409  {
4410  bool ok = mHeader.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_HEADER acHeader
4411  ok &= mBuffer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Buffer mBuffer
4412  POPU32(mFlags, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord mFlags
4413  POPU32(mStatus, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord mStatus
4414  for (size_t ndx(0); ndx < 16; ndx++)
4415  POPU32(mRegisters[ndx], inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord mRegisters[16]
4416  for (size_t ndx(0); ndx < 16; ndx++)
4417  POPU32(mReserved[ndx], inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord mReserved[16]
4418  ok &= mTrailer.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2_TRAILER mTrailer
4419  return ok;
4420  }
4421 
4422  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS_STRUCT::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
4423  {
4424  PUSHU16(UWord(channelSpec), outBlob); // NTV2Crosspoint channelSpec
4425  PUSHU16(UWord(state), outBlob); // NTV2AutoCirculateState state
4426  PUSHU32(ULWord(startFrame), outBlob); // LWord startFrame
4427  PUSHU32(ULWord(endFrame), outBlob); // LWord endFrame
4428  PUSHU32(ULWord(activeFrame), outBlob); // LWord activeFrame
4429  PUSHU64(rdtscStartTime, outBlob); // ULWord64 rdtscStartTime
4430  PUSHU64(audioClockStartTime, outBlob); // ULWord64 audioClockStartTime
4431  PUSHU64(rdtscCurrentTime, outBlob); // ULWord64 rdtscCurrentTime
4432  PUSHU64(audioClockCurrentTime, outBlob); // ULWord64 audioClockCurrentTime
4433  PUSHU32(framesProcessed, outBlob); // ULWord framesProcessed
4434  PUSHU32(framesDropped, outBlob); // ULWord framesDropped
4435  PUSHU32(bufferLevel, outBlob); // ULWord bufferLevel
4436  PUSHU8(bWithAudio, outBlob); // BOOL_ bWithAudio
4437  PUSHU8(bWithRP188, outBlob); // BOOL_ bWithRP188
4438  PUSHU8(bFbfChange, outBlob); // BOOL_ bFbfChange
4439  PUSHU8(bFboChange, outBlob); // BOOL_ bFboChange
4440  PUSHU8(bWithColorCorrection, outBlob); // BOOL_ bWithColorCorrection
4441  PUSHU8(bWithVidProc, outBlob); // BOOL_ bWithVidProc
4442  PUSHU8(bWithCustomAncData, outBlob); // BOOL_ bWithCustomAncData
4443  return true;
4444  }
4445 
4446  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS_STRUCT::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
4447  { uint16_t v16(0); uint32_t v32(0);
4448  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Crosspoint channelSpec
4449  channelSpec = NTV2Crosspoint(v16);
4450  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2AutoCirculateState state
4451  state = NTV2AutoCirculateState(v16);
4452  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord startFrame
4453  startFrame = LWord(v32);
4454  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord endFrame
4455  endFrame = LWord(v32);
4456  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord activeFrame
4457  activeFrame = LWord(v32);
4458  POPU64(rdtscStartTime, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 rdtscStartTime
4459  POPU64(audioClockStartTime, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 audioClockStartTime
4460  POPU64(rdtscCurrentTime, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 rdtscCurrentTime
4461  POPU64(audioClockCurrentTime, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 audioClockCurrentTime
4462  POPU32(framesProcessed, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord framesProcessed
4463  POPU32(framesDropped, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord framesDropped
4464  POPU32(bufferLevel, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord bufferLevel
4465  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bWithAudio), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bWithAudio
4466  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bWithRP188), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bWithRP188
4467  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bFbfChange), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bFbfChange
4468  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bFboChange), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bFboChange
4469  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bWithColorCorrection), inBlob, inOutIndex);// BOOL_ bWithColorCorrection
4470  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bWithVidProc), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bWithVidProc
4471  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bWithCustomAncData), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bWithCustomAncData
4472  return true;
4473  }
4474 
4475  bool RP188_STRUCT::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
4476  {
4477  PUSHU32(DBB, outBlob); // ULWord DBB
4478  PUSHU32(Low, outBlob); // ULWord Low
4479  PUSHU32(High, outBlob); // ULWord High
4480  return true;
4481  }
4482 
4483  bool RP188_STRUCT::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
4484  {
4485  POPU32(DBB, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord DBB
4486  POPU32(Low, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord Low
4487  POPU32(High, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord High
4488  return true;
4489  }
4490 
4491 
4492  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TASK_STRUCT::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
4493  {
4494  PUSHU32(taskVersion, outBlob); // ULWord taskVersion
4495  PUSHU32(taskSize, outBlob); // ULWord taskSize
4496  PUSHU32(numTasks, outBlob); // ULWord numTasks
4497  PUSHU32(maxTasks, outBlob); // ULWord maxTasks
4498  PUSHU64(ULWord64(taskArray), outBlob); // ULWord taskArray
4499  if (taskArray && numTasks)
4500  for (ULWord num(0); num < numTasks; num++)
4501  {
4502  const AutoCircGenericTask & task (taskArray[num]);
4503  PUSHU32(task.taskType, outBlob); // AutoCircTaskType taskType
4504  const ULWord * pULWords = reinterpret_cast<const ULWord*>(&task.u);
4505  ULWord numWords(0);
4506  if (NTV2_IS_REGISTER_TASK(task.taskType))
4507  numWords = sizeof(AutoCircRegisterTask)/sizeof(ULWord);
4508  else if (NTV2_IS_TIMECODE_TASK(task.taskType))
4509  numWords = sizeof(AutoCircTimeCodeTask)/sizeof(ULWord);
4510  for (ULWord word(0); word < numWords; word++)
4511  PUSHU32(pULWords[word], outBlob);
4512  }
4513  return true;
4514  }
4515 
4516  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_TASK_STRUCT::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
4517  { ULWord u32(0); ULWord64 u64(0);
4518  POPU32(taskVersion, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord taskVersion
4519  POPU32(taskSize, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord taskSize
4520  POPU32(numTasks, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord numTasks
4521  POPU32(maxTasks, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord maxTasks
4522  POPU64(u64, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord taskArray
4523  taskArray = reinterpret_cast<AutoCircGenericTask*>(u64);
4524  if (taskArray && numTasks)
4525  for (ULWord num(0); num < numTasks; num++)
4526  {
4527  AutoCircGenericTask & task (taskArray[num]);
4528  POPU32(u32, inBlob, inOutIndex); // AutoCircTaskType taskType
4529  task.taskType = AutoCircTaskType(u32);
4530  ULWord * pULWords = reinterpret_cast<ULWord*>(&task.u);
4531  ULWord numWords(0);
4532  if (NTV2_IS_REGISTER_TASK(task.taskType))
4533  numWords = sizeof(AutoCircRegisterTask)/sizeof(ULWord);
4534  else if (NTV2_IS_TIMECODE_TASK(task.taskType))
4535  numWords = sizeof(AutoCircTimeCodeTask)/sizeof(ULWord);
4536  for (ULWord word(0); word < numWords; word++)
4537  POPU32(pULWords[word], inBlob, inOutIndex);
4538  }
4539  return true;
4540  }
4541 
4542  bool FRAME_STAMP_STRUCT::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
4543  {
4544  PUSHU16(UWord(channelSpec), outBlob); // NTV2Crosspoint channelSpec
4545  PUSHU64(ULWord64(frameTime), outBlob); // LWord64 frameTime
4546  PUSHU32(frame, outBlob); // ULWord frame
4547  PUSHU64(audioClockTimeStamp, outBlob); // ULWord64 audioClockTimeStamp
4548  PUSHU32(audioExpectedAddress, outBlob); // ULWord audioExpectedAddress
4549  PUSHU32(audioInStartAddress, outBlob); // ULWord audioInStartAddress
4550  PUSHU32(audioInStopAddress, outBlob); // ULWord audioInStopAddress
4551  PUSHU32(audioOutStopAddress, outBlob); // ULWord audioOutStopAddress
4552  PUSHU32(audioOutStartAddress, outBlob); // ULWord audioOutStartAddress
4553  PUSHU32(bytesRead, outBlob); // ULWord bytesRead
4554  PUSHU32(startSample, outBlob); // ULWord startSample
4555  PUSHU64(ULWord64(currentTime), outBlob); // LWord64 currentTime
4556  PUSHU32(currentFrame, outBlob); // ULWord currentFrame
4557  currentRP188.RPCEncode(outBlob); // RP188_STRUCT currentRP188
4558  PUSHU64(ULWord64(currentFrameTime), outBlob); // LWord64 currentFrameTime
4559  PUSHU64(audioClockCurrentTime, outBlob); // ULWord64 audioClockCurrentTime
4560  PUSHU32(currentAudioExpectedAddress, outBlob); // ULWord currentAudioExpectedAddress
4561  PUSHU32(currentAudioStartAddress, outBlob); // ULWord currentAudioStartAddress
4562  PUSHU32(currentFieldCount, outBlob); // ULWord currentFieldCount
4563  PUSHU32(currentLineCount, outBlob); // ULWord currentLineCount
4564  PUSHU32(currentReps, outBlob); // ULWord currentReps
4565  PUSHU32(currenthUser, outBlob); // ULWord currenthUser
4566  return true;
4567  }
4568 
4569  bool FRAME_STAMP_STRUCT::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
4570  { uint16_t v16(0); uint64_t v64(0);
4571  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Crosspoint channelSpec
4572  channelSpec = NTV2Crosspoint(v16);
4573  POPU64(v64, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord64 frameTime
4574  frameTime = LWord64(v64);
4575  POPU32(frame, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord frame
4576  POPU64(audioClockTimeStamp, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 audioClockTimeStamp
4577  POPU32(audioExpectedAddress, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord audioExpectedAddress
4578  POPU32(audioInStartAddress, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord audioInStartAddress
4579  POPU32(audioInStopAddress, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord audioInStopAddress
4580  POPU32(audioOutStopAddress, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord audioOutStopAddress
4581  POPU32(audioOutStartAddress, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord audioOutStartAddress
4582  POPU32(bytesRead, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord bytesRead
4583  POPU32(startSample, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord startSample
4584  POPU64(v64, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord64 currentTime
4585  currentTime = LWord64(v64);
4586  POPU32(currentFrame, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord currentFrame
4587  currentRP188.RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex); // RP188_STRUCT currentRP188
4588  POPU64(v64, inBlob, inOutIndex); // LWord64 currentFrameTime
4589  currentFrameTime = LWord64(v64);
4590  POPU64(audioClockCurrentTime, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord64 audioClockCurrentTime
4591  POPU32(currentAudioExpectedAddress, inBlob, inOutIndex);// ULWord currentAudioExpectedAddress
4592  POPU32(currentAudioStartAddress, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord currentAudioStartAddress
4593  POPU32(currentFieldCount, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord currentFieldCount
4594  POPU32(currentLineCount, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord currentLineCount
4595  POPU32(currentReps, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord currentReps
4596  POPU32(currenthUser, inBlob, inOutIndex); // ULWord currenthUser
4597  return true;
4598  }
4599 
4600  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_DATA::RPCEncode (UByteSequence & outBlob)
4601  {
4602  PUSHU16(UWord(eCommand), outBlob); // AUTO_CIRC_COMMAND eCommand
4603  PUSHU16(UWord(channelSpec), outBlob); // NTV2Crosspoint channelSpec
4604  PUSHU32(ULWord(lVal1), outBlob); // LWord lVal1
4605  PUSHU32(ULWord(lVal2), outBlob); // LWord lVal2
4606  PUSHU32(ULWord(lVal3), outBlob); // LWord lVal3
4607  PUSHU32(ULWord(lVal4), outBlob); // LWord lVal4
4608  PUSHU32(ULWord(lVal5), outBlob); // LWord lVal5
4609  PUSHU32(ULWord(lVal6), outBlob); // LWord lVal6
4610  PUSHU8(bVal1, outBlob); // BOOL_ bVal1
4611  PUSHU8(bVal2, outBlob); // BOOL_ bVal2
4612  PUSHU8(bVal3, outBlob); // BOOL_ bVal3
4613  PUSHU8(bVal4, outBlob); // BOOL_ bVal4
4614  PUSHU8(bVal5, outBlob); // BOOL_ bVal5
4615  PUSHU8(bVal6, outBlob); // BOOL_ bVal6
4616  PUSHU8(bVal7, outBlob); // BOOL_ bVal7
4617  PUSHU8(bVal8, outBlob); // BOOL_ bVal8
4618  PUSHU64(ULWord64(pvVal1), outBlob); // void* pvVal1
4619  PUSHU64(ULWord64(pvVal2), outBlob); // void* pvVal2
4620  PUSHU64(ULWord64(pvVal3), outBlob); // void* pvVal3
4621  PUSHU64(ULWord64(pvVal4), outBlob); // void* pvVal4
4622  if (eCommand == eGetAutoCirc && pvVal1)
4623  reinterpret_cast<AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS_STRUCT*>(pvVal1)->RPCEncode(outBlob);
4624  if ((eCommand == eGetFrameStamp || eCommand == eGetFrameStampEx2) && pvVal1)
4625  reinterpret_cast<FRAME_STAMP_STRUCT*>(pvVal1)->RPCEncode(outBlob);
4626  if (eCommand == eGetFrameStampEx2 && pvVal2)
4627  reinterpret_cast<AUTOCIRCULATE_TASK_STRUCT*>(pvVal2)->RPCEncode(outBlob);
4628  if (eCommand == eTransferAutoCirculate && pvVal1)
4629  reinterpret_cast<AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER_STRUCT*>(pvVal1)->RPCEncode(outBlob);
4630  return true;
4631  }
4632 
4633  bool AUTOCIRCULATE_DATA::RPCDecode (const UByteSequence & inBlob, size_t & inOutIndex)
4634  {
4635 #if defined(AJA_LINUX)
4636  #pragma GCC diagnostic push
4637  #pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Wstrict-aliasing"
4638 #endif
4639  uint16_t v16(0); uint32_t v32(0);
4640  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // AUTO_CIRC_COMMAND eCommand
4641  eCommand = AUTO_CIRC_COMMAND(v16);
4642  POPU16(v16, inBlob, inOutIndex); // NTV2Crosspoint channelSpec
4643  channelSpec = NTV2Crosspoint(v16);
4644  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); lVal1 = LWord(v32); // LWord lVal1
4645  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); lVal2 = LWord(v32); // LWord lVal2
4646  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); lVal3 = LWord(v32); // LWord lVal3
4647  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); lVal4 = LWord(v32); // LWord lVal4
4648  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); lVal5 = LWord(v32); // LWord lVal5
4649  POPU32(v32, inBlob, inOutIndex); lVal6 = LWord(v32); // LWord lVal6
4650  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bVal1), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bVal1
4651  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bVal2), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bVal2
4652  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bVal3), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bVal3
4653  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bVal4), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bVal4
4654  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bVal5), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bVal5
4655  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bVal6), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bVal6
4656  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bVal7), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bVal7
4657  POPU8(AsU8Ref(bVal8), inBlob, inOutIndex); // BOOL_ bVal8
4658  POPU64(AsU64Ref(pvVal1), inBlob, inOutIndex); // void* pvVal1
4659  POPU64(AsU64Ref(pvVal2), inBlob, inOutIndex); // void* pvVal2
4660  POPU64(AsU64Ref(pvVal3), inBlob, inOutIndex); // void* pvVal3
4661  POPU64(AsU64Ref(pvVal4), inBlob, inOutIndex); // void* pvVal4
4662 #if defined(AJA_LINUX)
4663  #pragma GCC diagnostic pop
4664 #endif
4665  if (eCommand == eGetAutoCirc && pvVal1)
4666  reinterpret_cast<AUTOCIRCULATE_STATUS_STRUCT*>(pvVal1)->RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex);
4667  if ((eCommand == eGetFrameStamp || eCommand == eGetFrameStampEx2) && pvVal1)
4668  reinterpret_cast<FRAME_STAMP_STRUCT*>(pvVal1)->RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex);
4669  if (eCommand == eGetFrameStampEx2 && pvVal2)
4670  reinterpret_cast<AUTOCIRCULATE_TASK_STRUCT*>(pvVal2)->RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex);
4671  if (eCommand == eTransferAutoCirculate && pvVal1)
4672  reinterpret_cast<AUTOCIRCULATE_TRANSFER_STRUCT*>(pvVal1)->RPCDecode(inBlob, inOutIndex);
4673  return true;
4674  }
